Crypto is finally learning how to move.

The @Gemini x @solana card turns staking and rewards into something you actually use. No more “farm and forget”.

Earning, spending, and compounding now happen in a single feedback loop.  

One where on chain value meet off chain utility. 

With auto staking and 4% SOL back, it’s a concrete prototype for how digital assets can flow through real economies.

What happens when your wallet replaces your bank entirely?

A recent study showed that LLM traffic converts ~9x higher than traditional search.

It also highlighted some ways SEO Stuff (seo-stuff.com) has quietly been getting customers traffic + sales in 2025. 

Now that everything is out in the open, let's talk about it. 

But before we dive in...

If you want 3 unconfirmed cheat codes for landing in ChatGPT within the next ~30 or so days, just RT this + follow me + reply with "SEO Stuff ChatGPT Cheat Codes" and I'll DM them to you. 

You must do all 3 for the DM. 

Alright, let's get into it. 

A recent study from Lutz Finger (Forbes + Cornell) which I'll link to below found that when people use AI-driven interfaces like ChatGPT to discover products, they convert nearly NINE times better than traditional SEO traffic.

That’s not a typo, by the way.

And it's not a future prediction. 

It’s what they literally saw in the research. 

It's also kind of why SEO Stuff's Gold Plan (seo-stuff.com/gold-plan-pack…) went viral over the past couple of months.

Businesses are realizing the time to plant a flag in AI search is now because of how high-intent that traffic is. 

So let's get into the numbers. 

Finger and his team ran A/B tests using e-commerce sites that offered two search modes:

Traditional keyword-based search.

ChatGPT-style AI conversational search.

The difference was massive.

AI-driven sessions had 9x higher conversion rates.

Average query length jumped from 2–3 words to 23 words.

Sessions lasted 6+ minutes.

Shoppers said it “felt like advice from a knowledgeable friend.”

So what does that mean?

Well, it suggests people don’t want lists of links anymore.

Rather, they want answers that sound like a conversation and they’re 9x more likely to buy when they get them.

LLMs are becoming the decision layer before purchase, and while traditional SEO brings users to your site, AI search pre-qualifies them before they ever click.

As noted in the Forbes piece, when someone asks ChatGPT:

“What’s a compact camera for wildlife photography that fits in a carry-on?”

That’s not a casual query, it’s an active purchase decision.

In these cases, being cited as the trusted answer is *almost* the new Page 1 ranking.

Not quite fully yet, but we are clearly trending in that direction. 

So what does this mean for brands? 

To show up in LLM responses, your content needs to be structured like something a model can understand and reuse. 

That includes:

Conversational formatting: Write like you’re answering a question, not publishing a press release.

Clean structure: Direct answers first, with follow-up context in short sections.

Entity clarity: Clearly define who you are, what you sell, and why you’re credible.

Factual density: Models prefer content that contains concrete details, prices, comparisons, feature sets, results, not vague claims.

Schema alignment: AI systems rely on structured data to verify and extract facts.

That’s why long, keyword-stuffed blogs and abstract copy no longer work.

LLMs pull from conversational, factual, well-structured pages.

How SEO Stuff (seo-stuff.com) has already built this into its system:

SEO Stuff’s entire methodology was designed for exactly this environment, combining the traditional foundations of authority (links, relevance, structure) with the new layer of AI Search Optimization that Lutz Finger’s study validated.

1. The Gold Plan

 seo-stuff.com/gold-plan-pack…

10 long-form articles crafted in Q&A and step-by-step formats.

Direct answers in the first two sentences, followed by structured supporting detail.

3 DR50+ backlinks from trusted, AI-cited sources (which models rely on as verification).

Each Gold Plan article is optimized for both snippet extraction and LLM ingestion, which is why brands using it are already being cited in ChatGPT, Gemini, and Perplexity answers.

When the study says “traffic converts 9x higher,” this is the traffic they’re talking about, high-intent, conversationally guided buyers discovering brands inside AI systems.

2. The Premium Content Bundle

 seo-stuff.com/premium-conten…

60 “best of,” “top,” and “comparison” pages written in the same style AI assistants now favor.

Each one uses clean HTML, FAQ schema, conversational phrasing, and cross-linking for entity reinforcement.

Designed to feed both Google’s AI Overviews and ChatGPT’s retrieval pipelines.

This is the layer most brands are missing. 

It’s what helps the models actually understand your site and pull you into their answers.

And listen, even if you’re not using SEO Stuff (seo-stuff.com) yet, these are the signals that determine whether your content gets cited:

LLMs and agents often browse in text-only mode. 

Remove overlays, popups, and heavy JavaScript that block crawlers.

Use data, percentages, and structured points, models extract patterns, not prose.

A recent study from Lutz Finger (Forbes + Cornell) which I'll link to below found that when people use AI-driven interfaces like ChatGPT to discover products, they convert nearly NINE times better than traditional SEO traffic.

And it's not a future prediction. 

It’s what they literally saw in the research. 

It's also kind of why SEO Stuff's Gold Plan (seo-stuff.com/gold-plan-pack…) went viral over the past couple of months.

Businesses are realizing the time to plant a flag in AI search is now because of how high-intent that traffic is. 

So let's get into the numbers. 

Finger and his team ran A/B tests using e-commerce sites that offered two search modes:

Traditional keyword-based search.

ChatGPT-style AI conversational search.

The difference was massive.

AI-driven sessions had 9x higher conversion rates.

Average query length jumped from 2–3 words to 23 words.

Sessions lasted 6+ minutes.

So what does that mean?

Well, it suggests people don’t want lists of links anymore.

Rather, they want answers that sound like a conversation and they’re 9x more likely to buy when they get them.

LLMs are becoming the decision layer before purchase, and while traditional SEO brings users to your site, AI search pre-qualifies them before they ever click.

As noted in the Forbes piece, when someone asks ChatGPT:

“What’s a compact camera for wildlife photography that fits in a carry-on?”

That’s not a casual query, it’s an active purchase decision.

In these cases, being cited as the trusted answer is *almost* the new Page 1 ranking.

Not quite fully yet, but we are clearly trending in that direction. 

So what does this mean for brands? 

To show up in LLM responses, your content needs to be structured like something a model can understand and reuse. 

That includes:

Conversational formatting: Write like you’re answering a question, not publishing a press release.

Clean structure: Direct answers first, with follow-up context in short sections.

Entity clarity: Clearly define who you are, what you sell, and why you’re credible.

Factual density: Models prefer content that contains concrete details, prices, comparisons, feature sets, results, not vague claims.

Schema alignment: AI systems rely on structured data to verify and extract facts.

That’s why long, keyword-stuffed blogs and abstract copy no longer work.

LLMs pull from conversational, factual, well-structured pages.

Each Gold Plan article is optimized for both snippet extraction and LLM ingestion, which is why brands using it are already being cited in ChatGPT, Gemini, and Perplexity answers.

A recent study showed that LLM traffic converts ~9x higher than traditional search.

It also highlighted some ways SEO Stuff (seo-stuff.com) has quietly been getting customers traffic + sales in 2025. 

Now that everything is out in the open, let's talk about it. 

But before we dive in...

If you want 3 unconfirmed cheat codes for landing in ChatGPT within the next ~30 or so days, just RT this + follow me + reply with "SEO Stuff ChatGPT Cheat Codes" and I'll DM them to you. 

You must do all 3 for the DM. 

Alright, let's get into it. 

A recent study from Lutz Finger (Forbes + Cornell) which I'll link to below found that when people use AI-driven interfaces like ChatGPT to discover products, they convert nearly NINE times better than traditional SEO traffic.

That’s not a typo, by the way.

And it's not a future prediction. 

It’s what they literally saw in the research. 

It's also kind of why SEO Stuff's Gold Plan (seo-stuff.com/gold-plan-pack…) went viral over the past couple of months.

Businesses are realizing the time to plant a flag in AI search is now because of how high-intent that traffic is. 

So let's get into the numbers. 

Finger and his team ran A/B tests using e-commerce sites that offered two search modes:

Traditional keyword-based search.

ChatGPT-style AI conversational search.

The difference was massive.

AI-driven sessions had 9x higher conversion rates.

Average query length jumped from 2–3 words to 23 words.

Sessions lasted 6+ minutes.

Shoppers said it “felt like advice from a knowledgeable friend.”

So what does that mean?

Well, it suggests people don’t want lists of links anymore.

Rather, they want answers that sound like a conversation and they’re 9x more likely to buy when they get them.

LLMs are becoming the decision layer before purchase, and while traditional SEO brings users to your site, AI search pre-qualifies them before they ever click.

As noted in the Forbes piece, when someone asks ChatGPT:

“What’s a compact camera for wildlife photography that fits in a carry-on?”

That’s not a casual query, it’s an active purchase decision.

In these cases, being cited as the trusted answer is *almost* the new Page 1 ranking.

Not quite fully yet, but we are clearly trending in that direction. 

So what does this mean for brands? 

To show up in LLM responses, your content needs to be structured like something a model can understand and reuse. 

That includes:

Conversational formatting: Write like you’re answering a question, not publishing a press release.

Clean structure: Direct answers first, with follow-up context in short sections.

Entity clarity: Clearly define who you are, what you sell, and why you’re credible.

Factual density: Models prefer content that contains concrete details, prices, comparisons, feature sets, results, not vague claims.

Schema alignment: AI systems rely on structured data to verify and extract facts.

That’s why long, keyword-stuffed blogs and abstract copy no longer work.

LLMs pull from conversational, factual, well-structured pages.

How SEO Stuff (seo-stuff.com) has already built this into its system:

SEO Stuff’s entire methodology was designed for exactly this environment, combining the traditional foundations of authority (links, relevance, structure) with the new layer of AI Search Optimization that Lutz Finger’s study validated.

1. The Gold Plan

 seo-stuff.com/gold-plan-pack…

10 long-form articles crafted in Q&A and step-by-step formats.

Direct answers in the first two sentences, followed by structured supporting detail.

3 DR50+ backlinks from trusted, AI-cited sources (which models rely on as verification).

Each Gold Plan article is optimized for both snippet extraction and LLM ingestion, which is why brands using it are already being cited in ChatGPT, Gemini, and Perplexity answers.

When the study says “traffic converts 9x higher,” this is the traffic they’re talking about, high-intent, conversationally guided buyers discovering brands inside AI systems.

2. The Premium Content Bundle

 seo-stuff.com/premium-conten…

60 “best of,” “top,” and “comparison” pages written in the same style AI assistants now favor.

Each one uses clean HTML, FAQ schema, conversational phrasing, and cross-linking for entity reinforcement.

Designed to feed both Google’s AI Overviews and ChatGPT’s retrieval pipelines.

This is the layer most brands are missing. 

It’s what helps the models actually understand your site and pull you into their answers.

And listen, even if you’re not using SEO Stuff (seo-stuff.com) yet, these are the signals that determine whether your content gets cited:

LLMs and agents often browse in text-only mode. 

Remove overlays, popups, and heavy JavaScript that block crawlers.

Use data, percentages, and structured points, models extract patterns, not prose.

Point your canonical tags to the transactional or definitive page. 

Don’t confuse models with duplicate or diluted URLs.

Mention your brand consistently (same spelling, same schema). 

Disconnected mentions reduce authority.

Build FAQ-style sections targeting real questions users ask in ChatGPT and Perplexity.

This isn’t optional anymore, it’s what determines who becomes the “answer” inside AI search.

LLM-driven traffic may still be smaller in volume, but it’s already really valuable. 

Finger’s research shows it converts 9x higher because users are arriving later in the buying journey.

entries.summary:
好的，这是根据您提供的摘要完成的最近一小时 AI 领域推特趋势分析。

1. top趋势关键词：
DeepSeek（模型性能对比/量化交易应用）
AI Agent（商业变现/语音自动化）
AI 泡沫（行业投资/算力担忧）
AI 微支付（商业化/比特币结合）
Sora 2（AI 视频工作流）

2. 提到的 AI 产品及亮点：
DeepSeek｜估计提及次数 2｜亮点评述：在特定领域表现出色，尤其是在中文任务处理和量化交易策略上，被认为性能优于 ChatGPT 且更具性价比。
ChatGPT｜估计提及次数 3｜亮点评述：作为性能对比的基准模型被频繁提及，但在量化交易等专业任务中表现不佳；同时引发了关于过度依赖可能导致人类认知能力下降的伦理讨论。
Sora 2｜估计提及次数 1｜亮点评述：被整合进一个高效的 AI 视频创作工作流中，与 Claude 和 Perplexity 结合，能生成引发观众强烈情感共鸣的视频内容。
语音 AI 自动化代理｜估计提及次数 1｜亮点评述：一个为房产经纪人快速定制（20分钟开发）的 AI 代理，成功实现了 43,000 美元的商业收入，展示了其在垂直领域的应用价值。

3. 使用技巧 / 教程 / 实战案例：
分享者：社区视频创作者｜方法步骤：将 Sora 2（视频生成）、Claude（创意与脚本）和 Perplexity（信息研究）三者结合，形成一套完整的视频创作流程。｜带来价值：宣称这套组合是“THE best combo for AI videos”，能够破解“让观众产生‘天哪，这个人太懂我了’这种感觉的视频生成公式”。

分享者：AI 应用开发者｜方法步骤：快速为房产经纪人客户构建一个专用的语音 AI 自动化代理，用于处理特定业务流程。｜带来价值：在极短的开发时间内（20分钟）交付了一个能产生巨大商业回报（43,000美元）的工具，验证了 AI Agent 在具体商业场景中的落地可行性和高投资回报率。

分享者：量化交易者｜方法步骤：在量化交易中，选择使用更专业的 DeepSeek 模型代替通用的 ChatGPT 模型来执行交易策略。｜带来价值：取得了显著的实盘收益，“三天13%的收益率”，而对比的 ChatGPT 策略则“亏损超52%”，证明了在专业金融领域，专用模型比通用模型更具优势。

4. 最有价值推文 TOP10：
1. 标题：DeepSeek 在量化交易中表现优异
   推文原文：「还是deepseek牛逼，三天13%的收益率...相反chatgpt已经亏损超52%」
   关键信息：在一次社区分享的量化交易实测中，基于 DeepSeek 模型的策略短期内获得了 13% 的正收益，而基于 ChatGPT 的策略则出现了超过 50% 的亏损。
   应用价值：对于从事 AI 量化交易的开发者或投资者，这条信息提示，选择针对特定任务（如金融分析）优化的模型，可能比使用通用大模型获得更好的结果。

2. 标题：AI 语音代理的商业成功案例
   推文原文：「I MADE A VOICE AI AUTOMATION AGENT FOR A REAL ESATE AGENT THAT MADE THEM $43,000」
   关键信息：一位开发者在 20 分钟内为一个房产经纪人构建了语音 AI 自动化代理，该代理为客户创造了 43,000 美元的收入。
   应用价值：此案例为 AI Agent 创业者和开发者提供了明确的商业化方向：聚焦垂直行业，解决具体痛点，即使是快速开发的小型应用也能产生巨大的商业价值。

3. 标题：高效 AI 视频创作工作流
   推文原文：「sora 2 + claude + perlexity is THE best combo for AI videos...i cracked the formula for generating videos that make your audience feel like "holy shit this person gets me"」
   关键信息：一位创作者分享了其发现的最佳 AI 视频制作组合：使用 Perplexity 进行信息研究，Claude 进行创意构思和脚本写作，Sora 2 生成最终视频。
   应用价值：为内容创作者提供了一个具体、可复制的 AI 工具链，以高效生产能与观众建立深度情感连接的视频内容。

4. 标题：关于 AI 投资泡沫的担忧
   推文原文：「Sam Altman 促成 OpenAI 与科技巨头达成数百亿美元交易，引发 AI 泡沫担忧」
   关键信息：OpenAI 与科技巨头之间涉及数百亿美元的交易，引发了市场对 AI 硬件和算力投入是否过热、可能形成泡沫的担忧。
   应用价值：提醒 AI 领域的投资者和从业者，需要警惕当前大规模资本投入背后可能存在的市场泡沫风险，并审慎评估长期投资策略。

5. 标题：DeepSeek 在中文处理上的优势
   推文原文：「deepseek在中文的一些东西上吊打chatgpt」
   关键信息：中文社区用户明确指出，DeepSeek 模型在处理某些中文任务时的表现远超 ChatGPT，且更具性价比。
   应用价值：对于主要面向中文市场的开发者和企业，选择 DeepSeek 作为底层模型可能会是更高效、更经济的选择。

6. 标题：AI 对人类认知能力的潜在负面影响
   推文原文：「ChatGPT等大模型的负面影响...已经有明显“脑残”的倾向（大脑神经元链接线性简单化）」
   关键信息：有观点提出，过度依赖 ChatGPT 等大模型可能导致人类认知能力下降，表现为思维模式的“线性简单化”。
   应用价值：这是一个重要的警示，提醒教育工作者、产品设计师和普通用户，在使用 AI 工具时应保持批判性思维，避免完全放弃独立思考。

7. 标题：AI 与比特币微支付的结合趋势
   推文原文：「...AI micropayments, and why Bitcoin will be bigger than gold.」
   关键信息：社区开始探讨将 AI 服务与比特币微支付（特别是闪电网络）结合的商业模式，认为这是 AI 服务实现大规模商业化的关键路径。
   应用价值：为 AI 应用开发者提供了新的商业化思路，即通过微交易模式降低用户使用门槛、实现服务变现，尤其适用于高频、低成本的 AI 调用场景。

8. 标题：AI 对未来就业市场的激进预测
   推文原文：「De neste 10-20 år vil 75% av alle jobber ... være tatt over av AI og roboter.」
   关键信息：一则激进预测认为，未来 10 到 20 年内，人工智能和机器人将取代所有行业中高达 75% 的工作岗位。
   应用价值：虽然预测较为极端，但它凸显了社会需要为 AI 带来的颠覆性就业市场变革做准备，个人和组织应提前规划职业转型和技能提升。

9. 标题：AI 融入日常生活琐事
   推文原文：「...1261 dagar som AI räknade ut det.」
   关键信息：一个生活化案例显示，用户使用 AI 来完成日常的日期计算，这表明 AI 作为个人计算助手正在变得越来越普及。
   应用价值：揭示了 AI 工具的巨大市场潜力在于解决普通人的日常琐碎问题，开发者可以关注这些“微不足道”但高频的需求。

（说明：根据提供的摘要，共整理出 9 条有价值的推文，未达到 10 条。）

¿Crees que le ganarías a una IA haciendo trading de criptomonedas? Bueno, hay 5 de ellas compitiendo en este momento. Te contamos de esta particular competencia entre ChatGPT, Grok, Gemini y otras IA.

Sam Altman 促成 OpenAI 与科技巨头达成数百亿美元交易，引发 AI 泡沫担忧

Sam Altman 近期通过一系列交易，为 OpenAI 锁定了与英伟达、甲骨文和博通等科技巨头价值数百亿美元的合作，将这些公司的命运与 OpenAI 紧密相连，使其达到“大到不能倒”的境地。这些交易推动了甲骨文、英伟达、AMD 和博通的股价飙升，在公告发布后的首个交易日内，它们的市值合计增加了 6300 亿美元。

Altman 致力于为 OpenAI 获取看似无限的计算能力，其愿景是到 2033 年建成 250 吉瓦的计算容量，预计成本将超过 10 万亿美元。尽管 OpenAI 今年营收预计为 130 亿美元，但仅与英伟达和甲骨文的计算费用就高达 6500 亿美元，这引发了人们对人工智能热情可能演变为泡沫的担忧。微软曾拒绝 Altman 的大规模数据中心投资请求，但甲骨文随后签署了 3000 亿美元的合同，英伟达也达成 3500 亿美元的芯片租赁协议，并可能担保 OpenAI 的贷款。AMD 和博通也分别与 OpenAI 达成了数十亿美元的计算能力和芯片系统合作。

Sam Altman 促成 OpenAI 与科技巨头达成数百亿美元交易，引发 AI 泡沫担忧

Sam Altman 近期通过一系列交易，为 OpenAI 锁定了与英伟达、甲骨文和博通等科技巨头价值数百亿美元的合作，将这些公司的命运与 OpenAI 紧密相连，使其达到“大到不能倒”的境地。这些交易推动了甲骨文、英伟达、AMD 和博通的股价飙升，在公告发布后的首个交易日内，它们的市值合计增加了 6300 亿美元。

Altman 致力于为 OpenAI 获取看似无限的计算能力，其愿景是到 2033 年建成 250 吉瓦的计算容量，预计成本将超过 10 万亿美元。尽管 OpenAI 今年营收预计为 130 亿美元，但仅与英伟达和甲骨文的计算费用就高达 6500 亿美元，这引发了人们对人工智能热情可能演变为泡沫的担忧。微软曾拒绝 Altman 的大规模数据中心投资请求，但甲骨文随后签署了 3000 亿美元的合同，英伟达也达成 3500 亿美元的芯片租赁协议，并可能担保 OpenAI 的贷款。AMD 和博通也分别与 OpenAI 达成了数十亿美元的计算能力和芯片系统合作。

Altman 致力于为 OpenAI 获取看似无限的计算能力，其愿景是到 2033 年建成 250 吉瓦的计算容量，预计成本将超过 10 万亿美元。尽管 OpenAI 今年营收预计为 130 亿美元，但仅与英伟达和甲骨文的计算费用就高达 6500 亿美元，这引发了人们对人工智能热情可能演变为泡沫的担忧。微软曾拒绝 Altman 的大规模数据中心投资请求，但甲骨文随后签署了 3000 亿美元的合同，英伟达也达成 3500 亿美元的芯片租赁协议，并可能担保 OpenAI 的贷款。AMD 和博通也分别与 OpenAI 达成了数十亿美元的计算能力和芯片系统合作。

entries.summary:
好的，这是对该推文分段的分析提炼：

*   **AI 模型表现评估 —— 一种新颖的“交易”式评估数据显示，DeepSeek 和 Claude 等模型表现强劲，而 Gemini 和 GPT 系列则大幅回调，反映出市场对开源/独立模型的信心增强；原文：「开源/独立模型（如 DeepSeek、Grok）更抗跌，封闭巨头（如 GPT）短期承压。」**

*   **去中心化 AI 计算 —— Gensyn 协议通过构建一个全球“GPU 互联网”，旨在打破少数巨头对算力的垄断，让任何人都能参与 AI 模型的训练与使用；原文：「Imagine the Internet of GPUs - a global network where every computer…can join together to train AI.」**

*   **AI Agent 应用 —— 出现了 Oura 和 LumiTown 等面向垂直领域的 AI Agent：前者用于加密货币实时技术分析，后者在游戏中自动执行任务，标志着 Agent 技术正走向实用化；原文：「Oura runs real-time TA on any solana token pair…In LumiTown, it’s your Agent doing the same…」**

*   **AI 应用普及度洞察 —— 社区观察发现，AI 工具的实际采用率远低于预期，即使是 ChatGPT Plus 的付费门槛也阻挡了绝大多数人，普通用户与前沿玩家之间存在巨大鸿沟；原文：「现在绝大多数人还没买ChatGPT Plus…一点点的门槛，就可以拦住99%的人。」**

*   **AI Agent 开发平台 —— Teneo Protocol 提供 Agent SDK，旨在降低开发者构建和部署自定义 AI Agent 的门槛，并能将其集成到一个去中心化的智能网络中；原文：「Developers can now imagine, build, and deploy their own AI Agents...powered by the Agent SDK...」**

*   **AI 自动化商业案例 —— 出现了利用 n8n + GHL 工具组合实现业务全自动化的案例，声称可产生每月 20 万美元的收入，展示了 AI 在营销和销售领域的巨大商业价值；原文：「$200K/month with just n8n + GHL…100% autopilot — zero manual work」**

original_tweets.text:
这份来自 Alpha Arena 的 AI 模型“战场”表现数据很有趣，将 AI 模型比作加密货币代币进行“交易”评估，，结合了 ChatGPT、DeepSeek、Grok 等热门模型的表现。整体来看：

- **领先者**：DeepSeek Chat V3.1 以 $11,055 的“市值”领跑，24h 涨幅 +10.55%，7d 涨幅高达 $1,055，强势霸榜。Claude Sonnet 4.5 紧随其后，$10,917 +9.17%，稳定输出。

- **中游稳健**：Grok 4 位列第三，$10,136 +1.36%，虽涨幅温和，但 7d 累计 $136.06，显示出韧性，适合长线“持有”。

- **后排承压**：Gemini Max、Gemini 2.5 Pro 和 GPT 5 集体暴跌，分别 -13.78%、-36.25% 和 -39.02%，7d 损失从 -$378 到 -$3,902 不等，看来“市场”对它们的“升级”预期不高。

市场洞察：前 30% 的“利润”机会集中在 DeepSeek 和 Claude，后 30% 的风险则在 Gemini 和 GPT 系列。结合 BTC/ETH 等主流币的波动，这份数据像是一场 AI+加密的“模拟交易”，提醒我们：AI 战场瞬息万变，选对“币种”才能笑到最后。

币的波动，这份数据像是一场 AI+加密的“模拟交易”，提醒我们：AI 战场瞬息万变，选对“币种”才能笑到最后。

总体趋势：开源/独立模型（如 DeepSeek、Grok）更抗跌，封闭巨头（如 GPT）短期承压。未来若有 Grok 5，期待更猛的反转。
你确实有信息差，deepseek可不比ChatGPT还有Gemini差

5日で資産を半減させちゃってる、ChatGPTちゃんとGeminiちゃんは使えない子でもう早期退職でええやろ。
nof1.ai

我前段时间，发朋友圈说最近用上了Gemini CLI，只有3个好友来互动，喊我玩Claude code和codex。

现在绝大多数人还没买ChatGPT Plus。
难吗？也就是翻个墙的事，再搞一下付款方式。
但一点点的门槛，就可以拦住99%的人。

只要多一点勇气，对新事物充满好奇心，多探索未知。

我就是人群中的前1%。

赛博斗蛐蛐
分析两点交易策略
第一、跟着deepseek买
第二、跟着chatGPT反着买（）
polymarket.com/event/nof1ai-a…
你确实有信息差，deepseek可不比ChatGPT还有Gemini差

这份来自 Alpha Arena 的 AI 模型“战场”表现数据很有趣，将 AI 模型比作加密货币代币进行“交易”评估，，结合了 ChatGPT、DeepSeek、Grok 等热门模型的表现。整体来看：

- **领先者**：DeepSeek Chat V3.1 以 $11,055 的“市值”领跑，24h 涨幅 +10.55%，7d 涨幅高达 $1,055，强势霸榜。Claude Sonnet 4.5 紧随其后，$10,917 +9.17%，稳定输出。

- **中游稳健**：Grok 4 位列第三，$10,136 +1.36%，虽涨幅温和，但 7d 累计 $136.06，显示出韧性，适合长线“持有”。

- **后排承压**：Gemini Max、Gemini 2.5 Pro 和 GPT 5 集体暴跌，分别 -13.78%、-36.25% 和 -39.02%，7d 损失从 -$378 到 -$3,902 不等，看来“市场”对它们的“升级”预期不高。

市场洞察：前 30% 的“利润”机会集中在 DeepSeek 和 Claude，后 30% 的风险则在 Gemini 和 GPT 系列。结合 BTC/ETH 等主流币的波动，这份数据像是一场 AI+加密的“模拟交易”，提醒我们：AI 战场瞬息万变，选对“币种”才能笑到最后。

币的波动，这份数据像是一场 AI+加密的“模拟交易”，提醒我们：AI 战场瞬息万变，选对“币种”才能笑到最后。

总体趋势：开源/独立模型（如 DeepSeek、Grok）更抗跌，封闭巨头（如 GPT）短期承压。未来若有 Grok 5，期待更猛的反转。
Heard on the Street: ChatGPT has the potential to make shoppers’ lives much easier. The effect on retailers will be more complicated.

gswarm everyone

When people talk about AI today, they usually imagine ChatGPT, Gemini, or Claude.
But behind every model like that - there’s massive compute power, huge data centers, and millions of dollars spent just to train a single model once.
That’s where Gensyn steps in.

🧠 What is Gensyn really?
Imagine the Internet of GPUs - a global network where every computer, every data center, every idle GPU can join together to train AI.

Instead of one company owning all the compute, Gensyn connects thousands of machines into a decentralized supercluster.

Anyone can provide computing power, and anyone can use it.

It’s like Uber for AI compute - but instead of cars, you share processing power, and instead of moving people, you move intelligence.

 How it works (in human terms)

Your laptop, your rig, or your server connects to the Gensyn protocol.

Tasks (training, inference, simulations) get distributed across many nodes.

Every contributor gets verified, rewarded, and tracked on-chain.

The network checks and validates every task - making sure results are legit and no one’s faking the work.
That’s the key: verifiable compute.

 Why it matters

Right now, AI development is centralized in the hands of a few.
If you want to train a model, you need money, infrastructure, and access.

Gensyn flips the table - it says:
“Let’s make compute open, scalable, and owned by the people who run it.”

That means more experiments, faster innovation, and fairer access to machine learning tools.

It’s not just about decentralization - it’s about redefining how intelligence grows.

 Why this is beautiful
Every time a node joins the network, it becomes part of a living, breathing ecosystem - a digital organism where data, energy, and creativity flow freely.
Gensyn isn’t just a project - it’s a movement towards computational democracy.

The same way the internet connected people, Gensyn connects intelligences.

And when I look at that glowing 3D cube from their visuals - I don’t just see a tech symbol.
I see the heartbeat of decentralized AI.

 Final thoughts

AI should not belong to corporations.
It should belong to the collective, to those who build, experiment, and dream.
Gensyn is building that reality, step by step, block by block, node by node.

So next time you hear “decentralized compute,”
remember - it’s not about machines.
It’s about giving intelligence back to humanity.

unveiling Oura: your new technical analyst agent

Oura runs real-time TA on any solana token pair, including microcaps, integrating with the rest of the agent swarm, and feeding its insights into aya’s reasoning model & vega’s autonomous trading layer

what it does now:

→ identifies supports, resistances & fair value gaps
→ detects liquidity zones and volatility shifts
→ analyzes RSI, MACD, VWAP & EMAs (21/50/200 by default)
→ adapts to any timeframe (intraday or swing)
→ issues long/short bias with clear confirmation logic
→ streams price action in real time

in other words: she reads charts better than 90% of ct.

好的，这是根据您提供的摘要完成的最近一小时 AI 领域趋势分析。

1. top趋势关键词：

*   DeepSeek（交易能力/用户体验）
*   生成式引擎优化/GEO（内容营销新方向）
*   AI交易（模型实战能力验证）
*   AI工具箱（用户使用习惯变迁）
*   多模型融合（应用开发新范式）

2. 提到的 AI 产品及亮点：

*   DeepSeek｜估计提及次数：4｜亮点评述：在加密货币交易实验中实现 10% 盈利，实战能力强；同时，其展示思考逻辑过程的方式在日常工作中对用户更具启发性，导致部分用户从 ChatGPT 迁移。
*   Claude｜估计提及次数：1｜亮点评述：虽然用户规模远小于 ChatGPT，但其单次下载净收入几乎与后者持平（2.97美元 vs 3.14美元），证明其用户有极强付费意愿，验证了 AI 助手赛道“小而美”的盈利模式可行。
*   CyberLife｜估计提及次数：1｜亮点评述：该平台通过融合 GPT、Claude、Grok 等七种顶级 AI 模型，让用户仅凭概念描述就能直接生成可玩的游戏世界，展示了多模型协同创作的巨大潜力。
*   ChainGPT｜估计提及次数：1｜亮点评述：其 LLM SDK 被 Web3 项目集成，旨在摆脱对中心化模型的依赖，实现输出结果的“去信任化”和透明化，为去中心化 AI 应用开辟新路径。
*   SentientAGI｜估计提及次数：1｜亮点评述：提出 GRID 概念，通过交易、研究、推理等多智能体的实时协作与互相验证，来提升复杂决策的质量和可靠性。

3. 使用技巧 / 教程 / 实战案例：

*   分享者：营销社区｜方法步骤：通过 TikTok 运营增加品牌搜索和反向链接，从而赢得 Google 和 ChatGPT 等 AI 引擎的信任与引用｜带来价值：实现 GEO (生成式引擎优化)，将 AI 答案中的“引用”(Citations) 视为“新时代的反向链接”，最终提升收入。「More TikTok attention leads to more branded searches which leads to more AI citations…Citations...The new backlinks.」
*   分享者：普通用户｜方法步骤：不再依赖单一通用 AI，而是针对特定问题构建“AI 工具箱”，例如用 Syllaby.io 解决视频创意，用 Ranked.ai 解决 SEO 难题｜带来价值：更高效、专业地解决垂直领域问题，体现了 AI 应用的专用化和组合化新趋势。「Problem: I don’t like creating videos Solution: Syllaby.io...Problem: I struggle to rank on Google Solution: Ranked.ai」
*   分享者：Web3 项目 @palmaierc｜方法步骤：集成 ChainGPT 的原生 LLM SDK，替换对中心化 AI 模型的依赖｜带来价值：实现 AI 输出结果的“去信任化”和透明化，为去中心化应用（dApps）开辟了新的集成路径。「integrated ChainGPT’s LLM SDK to remove the reliance on centralized AI models—making outputs trustless, transparent, and fully Web3-native.」

4. 最有价值推文 TOP10：

1. 标题：SEO 的未来：生成式引擎优化 (GEO)
   推文原文：「GEO (Generative Engine Optimization) The new SEO. Optimizing for AI engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity...Citations...The new backlinks.」
   关键信息：营销优化的重心正从传统搜索引擎转向生成式 AI 引擎。核心目标不再是争取搜索排名，而是让内容被 AI 的回答直接“引用”(Citations)，这种引用被视为新时代的反向链接。
   应用价值：内容创作者和营销人员需要调整策略，专注于生产高质量、可被 AI 验证和引用的信息，以在 AI 驱动的信息分发中占据一席之地。

2. 标题：DeepSeek 在真实交易中获利 10%
   推文原文：「DeepSeek’s V3.1 AI outperformed five rival models in a real money, real market crypto trading experiment posting a 10% profit...」
   关键信息：DeepSeek V3.1 模型在真实的加密货币市场交易实验中，不仅超越了包括 ChatGPT 在内的五个对手模型，还实现了 10% 的盈利，验证了其在量化金融领域的实战能力。
   应用价值：对于金融科技和量化交易领域，这意味着 AI 模型已具备直接参与市场并创造真实利润的潜力。个人投资者和机构可以关注和评估将此类模型集成到交易策略中的可行性。

3. 标题：用户行为转变：从 ChatGPT 到国产模型
   推文原文：「现在有了deepseek和豆包，我碰都不碰ChatGPT了，因为不好用。」
   关键信息：社区中出现一股明显的用户迁移趋势，部分用户因 DeepSeek、豆包等国产大模型在特定场景（如逻辑推理展示、中文语境理解）下更好用，而完全停止使用 ChatGPT。
   应用价值：这提醒 AI 产品开发者和用户，通用模型的市场地位并非不可动摇。针对特定市场或特定需求优化的模型，能凭借差异化的用户体验赢得用户。

4. 标题：Claude 的高效盈利模式
   推文原文：「尽管 Anthropic 的 AI 助手 Claude 在全球下载量仅约 1500 万...但其每次下载带来的净收入达 2.97 美元，已接近 ChatGPT 的 3.14 美元...」
   关键信息：Claude 虽然用户基数远小于 ChatGPT，但其极高的单用户付费意愿和转化率，使其单位用户的创收能力几乎与行业领导者持平。
   应用价值：该数据证明了在 AI 应用市场，追求庞大用户规模并非唯一路径。通过提供高质量、差异化的服务来吸引高价值付费用户，是可行的、健康的商业模式。

5. 标题：AI 时代的新营销漏斗：AISO
   推文原文：「More TikTok attention leads to more branded searches which leads to more AI citations…TikTok + SEO + AI Search Optimization = revenue.」
   关键信息：一种新的营销方法论“AI 搜索优化”(AISO) 被提出。其路径是：利用 TikTok 等社交平台引爆关注，带动品牌词在传统搜索引擎的搜索量，进而被 AI 引擎学习和引用，最终转化为收入。
   应用价值：企业应将社交媒体运营、传统 SEO 和新兴的 GEO/AISO 整合考虑，构建一个跨平台的品牌影响力闭环，以适应 AI 时代的信息传播方式。

6. 标题：AI 重塑知识的价值
   推文原文：「AI时代，知识不再值钱，值钱的是获取信息的速度和理解信息的深度...找老师付费前不妨想一想对方有没有DeepSeek/ChatGPT/Gemini聪明.」
   关键信息：在大型语言模型普及的时代，单纯拥有知识的价值在下降。真正的核心竞争力转变为快速获取准确信息、并进行深度理解和整合的能力。人类专家的价值基准，正被顶级 AI 的能力所挑战。
   应用价值：个人和组织需要重新评估自身的核心能力，从“知识的存储者”转变为“信息的驾驭者和洞察的产生者”。在寻求专家建议时，应更看重其超越 AI 的分析、整合和创造能力。

7. 标题：多模型融合创造可玩游戏世界
   推文原文：「They’re blending 7 top AI models —GPT, Claude, Grok...into a system where anyone can describe a concept and turn it into a playable world」
   关键信息：AI 游戏平台 CyberLife 通过融合七种顶级 AI 模型，实现了一个创新应用：用户只需用自然语言描述一个概念，系统就能自动生成一个可交互的游戏世界。
   应用价值：这揭示了 AI 应用开发的一个重要趋势——多模型融合。通过“模型路由”或“模型合奏”的方式，开发者可以取长补短，构建出远超单一模型能力的强大应用。

8. 标题：AI 的去中心化集成
   推文原文：「@palmaierc integrated ChainGPT’s LLM SDK to remove the reliance on centralized AI models—making outputs trustless, transparent, and fully Web3-native.」
   关键信息：Web3 项目开始使用 ChainGPT 等原生 LLM SDK，以替代对 OpenAI 等中心化模型的依赖。此举旨在让 AI 的输出结果变得去信任化、过程透明，并与 Web3 的原生理念保持一致。
   应用价值：对于追求数据主权和运营透明度的应用（尤其在金融、治理等领域），集成去中心化 AI 模型是一个值得探索的方向，可以有效规避单点故障和审查风险。

9. 标题：构建个人 AI 工具箱
   推文原文：「Problem: I don’t like creating videos Solution: Syllaby.io...Problem: I struggle to rank on Google Solution: Ranked.ai」
   关键信息：用户的使用习惯正从依赖一个万能的 AI 助手，转变为根据不同任务构建一个由多个专用 AI 工具组成的“工具箱”。
   应用价值：用户应积极探索并组合使用各类垂直领域的 AI 工具，以最高效的方式解决具体问题。对于开发者而言，这预示着专注于解决特定痛点的专用 AI 工具市场潜力巨大。

10. 标题：DeepSeek 的启发式思考过程
    推文原文：「deepseek暴露思考逻辑和过程的方式有时候对我更有启发性，对于大多数人的工作而言这些基本上就够了」
    关键信息：用户发现，DeepSeek 在回答问题时展示其思考逻辑和分析过程的独特方式，比直接给出答案更有价值，能启发用户的思路。
    应用价值：AI 产品的设计不应只关注结果的准确性，还应关注过程的透明度和启发性。一个能“教会用户如何思考”的 AI，可能会比一个仅仅“提供答案”的 AI 拥有更高的用户粘性。

Not trying to insult your favorite social media platform here, but...

TikTok isn't what it once was. 

Instead of spraying out random content and praying for a viral hit, leverage it to get traffic + sales from ChatGPT and Google instead. 

That’s how you end up with a massive compounding growth engine.

When used correctly, TikTok + SEO + AI Search Optimization can add 5–7 figures in annual revenue, and without paid ads or outside agencies.

Here’s how to make it work before the end of 2025.

But before I get into it…

If you want the “unconfirmed” cheat codes we’re using to pull traffic from ChatGPT within ~30 to 60 days just follow me + RT this post + Comment “TikTok SEO Stuff Guide 2025" and I'll DM you. 

You must do all 3 for the DM.

First off, let's start at the top and keep it really simple.  

More TikTok attention leads to more branded searches which leads to more AI citations.

We all kind of know this in theory. 

But how do actually put it into practice?

Well, TikTok creates intent. 

Your site has to capture it.

Here's a basic checklist:

Link in bio to your service, pricing, or lead magnet (not your homepage).

In-video CTA to “Want the full guide? Link in bio.”

Pin a comment with your top landing page.

Ensure pages are fast (<3s), skimmable, and benefit-first.

Branded search is a top trust signal across both Google and AI search ecosystems.

It literally tells them that humans are intentionally looking for you.

How to create it through TikTok:

Say “Search [Brand Name] reviews” in your videos.

Show transformations or customer results with your brand name in captions.

Run testimonial-style TikToks using your logo or name visually.

Even a 5–10% increase in branded searches raises your chance of showing up across traditional and AI search. 

Track everything inside SEO Stuff’s Keyword Explorer.

You should also be turning TikTok comments into keyword data. 

TikTok comments are free keyword research.

Workflow:

Track common viewer questions and objections.

Copy their exact phrasing.

Use those phrases to build long-tail keywords.

Turn them into blog posts, FAQ sections, or comparison pages.

Example:

Comment: “Does this work for beginners?”
leads to Blog post: “Beginner’s Guide to [Product].”

This closes the semantic loop between your content, search intent, and what LLMs scrape as user-aligned phrasing.

And you can also earn backlinks from TikTok content. 

Yes, TikToks can generate backlinks, especially in B2B, SaaS, and creator niches.

Formats that get cited:

“How we hit $1M ARR using X framework.”

“Our content system that drives 40K visitors/month.”

“Legal / Marketing / SaaS breakdowns that demystify compliance or strategy.”

Pitch these TikToks to niche blogs and newsletters.

When your videos get referenced in articles, it feeds both SEO authority and AI trust signals.

Track earned links using SEO Stuff’s Backlink Explorer.

And make sure you're optimizing your site for social traffic and AI crawlers. 

Your website must serve two audiences simultaneously: humans from TikTok and AI scrapers.

Checklist:

Load speed < 3 seconds

TikTok embeds above the fold

Benefit-first headlines (“How We Scaled to $500K ARR in 9 Months”)

UGC or testimonial blocks mid-page

CTAs: “Download Guide,” “Book Call,” or “Try Free Demo”

Schema: Article + FAQ + Review + LocalBusiness

Each layer adds interpretability for AI engines like Gemini and Perplexity.

Also, embed the videos. 

Embedding isn’t just for aesthetics, it increases dwell time, scroll depth, and perceived engagement.

Where to embed:

Blog posts (add the related proof/demo Reel)

Case studies (embed testimonial TikToks)

Comparison pages (add quick explainer video)

Product/service pages (embed tutorial TikToks)

Embedding extends average session length, a major trust factor. 

Also, track the right analytics. 

Forget views, instead track behavioral + search metrics:

Branded search growth (Google Search Console + SEO Stuff)

TikTok referral performance (GA4, Hotjar)

Conversions from TikTok sessions

Backlinks earned from TikTok content

Scroll depth + dwell time on embedded pages

Double down on formats that increase both citations and conversions.

90-Day TikTok + SEO + AI Growth Plan:

Days 1–30:

Add TikTok bio link to highest-converting page.

Embed 3 TikToks across site.

Optimize for speed + CTAs.

Publish 3 TikToks (proof, tutorial, customer story).

Days 31–60:

Create 2 TikToks designed for backlinks.

Pitch to niche blogs + newsletters.

Track branded search weekly.

Turn top TikTok comments into blog content.

Days 61–90:

Repurpose best TikToks into longform blogs.

Refresh embedded pages with updated CTAs.

Run retargeting ads using UGC proof.

Scale formats producing backlinks + AI citations.

TikTok alone = views.

TikTok + SEO + AI Search Optimization = revenue.

This system:

Builds branded search trust

Earns backlinks + AI citations

Extends dwell time

Converts social intent into compounding search traffic

That’s how you add 5–7 figures of growth in 2025.

Want the done-for-you version?

We build complete SEO + AI systems that turn TikTok attention into long-term visibility.

Check SEO Stuff today over at seo stuff dot com. 

And if you want those “unconfirmed” ChatGPT cheat codes just follow + RT + Comment “TikTok SEO Stuff Guide 2025.”

You must do all 3 for the DM.

15 GEO Terms You MUST Know in 2025: 

(Save, study, & get familiar w/ these 15 terms or risk falling behind)

1. GEO (Generative Engine Optimization)
The new SEO. Optimizing for AI engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Google's SGE.

2. LLM (Large Language Model)
The AI brains behind tools like ChatGPT and Claude. Powers generative search.

3. LLM Sources
The pages AI models cite in their answers. A new battleground for organic visibility.

4. AI Overviews (SGE)
Google’s AI-powered summaries at the top of search. Threaten TOFU SEO rankings.

5. Citations
Links included in LLM answers. The new backlinks. You want to be here.

6. Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
A technique LLMs use to pull in real-time info from indexed content.

7. Answer Engine Optimization (AEO)
Optimizing content to be featured in AI and voice assistant answers.

8. Perplexity
A rising AI search engine that blends citations, generative answers, and browsing.

9. ChatGPT Browsing
OpenAI’s tool that uses Bing, Reddit, & other data sources to generate real-time answers.

10. Vector Search
Search powered by meaning, not keywords. Used heavily in AI engines.

11. Structured Content
Well-organized content with clear headers, bullets, and summaries. Easier for LLMs to parse.

12. AI Snippets
Short-form summaries generated by AI engines using your content.

13. Domain Authority (Still Matters)
Strong domains are more likely to be cited by LLMs. Authority = visibility.

14. Topical Authority
Owning a niche by consistently publishing deep, high-quality content on it.

15. Crawlability for AI
Ensuring your content can be indexed and interpreted by LLMs—not just Google bots.

---

GEO isn’t coming. It’s here.

If you wait until 2026, you'll be falling behind. 

Marketers must evolve or get replaced by AI answers.

Start learning these now.

Or risk watching your competitors outrank you. 

---

Whatcha think?

Link in bio to your service, pricing, or lead magnet (not your homepage).

In-video CTA to “Want the full guide? Link in bio.”

Pin a comment with your top landing page.

Ensure pages are fast (<3s), skimmable, and benefit-first.

How to create it through TikTok:

Show transformations or customer results with your brand name in captions.

Run testimonial-style TikToks using your logo or name visually.

Track everything inside SEO Stuff’s Keyword Explorer.

You should also be turning TikTok comments into keyword data. 

TikTok comments are free keyword research.

Workflow:

Track common viewer questions and objections.

Copy their exact phrasing.

Use those phrases to build long-tail keywords.

Turn them into blog posts, FAQ sections, or comparison pages.

Example:

Comment: “Does this work for beginners?”
leads to Blog post: “Beginner’s Guide to [Product].”

This closes the semantic loop between your content, search intent, and what LLMs scrape as user-aligned phrasing.

And you can also earn backlinks from TikTok content. 

Yes, TikToks can generate backlinks, especially in B2B, SaaS, and creator niches.

Formats that get cited:

“Legal / Marketing / SaaS breakdowns that demystify compliance or strategy.”

When your videos get referenced in articles, it feeds both SEO authority and AI trust signals.

Track earned links using SEO Stuff’s Backlink Explorer.

And make sure you're optimizing your site for social traffic and AI crawlers. 

Your website must serve two audiences simultaneously: humans from TikTok and AI scrapers.

Load speed < 3 seconds

Schema: Article + FAQ + Review + LocalBusiness

Each layer adds interpretability for AI engines like Gemini and Perplexity.

15 GEO Terms You MUST Know in 2025: 

(Save, study, & get familiar w/ these 15 terms or risk falling behind)

1. GEO (Generative Engine Optimization)
The new SEO. Optimizing for AI engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Google's SGE.

2. LLM (Large Language Model)
The AI brains behind tools like ChatGPT and Claude. Powers generative search.

3. LLM Sources
The pages AI models cite in their answers. A new battleground for organic visibility.

4. AI Overviews (SGE)
Google’s AI-powered summaries at the top of search. Threaten TOFU SEO rankings.

5. Citations
Links included in LLM answers. The new backlinks. You want to be here.

6. Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
A technique LLMs use to pull in real-time info from indexed content.

7. Answer Engine Optimization (AEO)
Optimizing content to be featured in AI and voice assistant answers.

8. Perplexity
A rising AI search engine that blends citations, generative answers, and browsing.

9. ChatGPT Browsing
OpenAI’s tool that uses Bing, Reddit, & other data sources to generate real-time answers.

10. Vector Search
Search powered by meaning, not keywords. Used heavily in AI engines.

11. Structured Content
Well-organized content with clear headers, bullets, and summaries. Easier for LLMs to parse.

12. AI Snippets
Short-form summaries generated by AI engines using your content.

13. Domain Authority (Still Matters)
Strong domains are more likely to be cited by LLMs. Authority = visibility.

14. Topical Authority
Owning a niche by consistently publishing deep, high-quality content on it.

15. Crawlability for AI
Ensuring your content can be indexed and interpreted by LLMs—not just Google bots.

GEO isn’t coming. It’s here.

Marketers must evolve or get replaced by AI answers.

Not trying to insult your favorite social media platform here, but...

TikTok isn't what it once was. 

Instead of spraying out random content and praying for a viral hit, leverage it to get traffic + sales from ChatGPT and Google instead. 

That’s how you end up with a massive compounding growth engine.

When used correctly, TikTok + SEO + AI Search Optimization can add 5–7 figures in annual revenue, and without paid ads or outside agencies.

Here’s how to make it work before the end of 2025.

But before I get into it…

If you want the “unconfirmed” cheat codes we’re using to pull traffic from ChatGPT within ~30 to 60 days just follow me + RT this post + Comment “TikTok SEO Stuff Guide 2025" and I'll DM you. 

You must do all 3 for the DM.

First off, let's start at the top and keep it really simple.  

More TikTok attention leads to more branded searches which leads to more AI citations.

We all kind of know this in theory. 

But how do actually put it into practice?

Well, TikTok creates intent. 

Your site has to capture it.

Here's a basic checklist:

Link in bio to your service, pricing, or lead magnet (not your homepage).

In-video CTA to “Want the full guide? Link in bio.”

Pin a comment with your top landing page.

Ensure pages are fast (<3s), skimmable, and benefit-first.

Branded search is a top trust signal across both Google and AI search ecosystems.

It literally tells them that humans are intentionally looking for you.

How to create it through TikTok:

Say “Search [Brand Name] reviews” in your videos.

Show transformations or customer results with your brand name in captions.

Run testimonial-style TikToks using your logo or name visually.

Even a 5–10% increase in branded searches raises your chance of showing up across traditional and AI search. 

Track everything inside SEO Stuff’s Keyword Explorer.

You should also be turning TikTok comments into keyword data. 

TikTok comments are free keyword research.

Workflow:

Track common viewer questions and objections.

Copy their exact phrasing.

Use those phrases to build long-tail keywords.

Turn them into blog posts, FAQ sections, or comparison pages.

Example:

Comment: “Does this work for beginners?”
leads to Blog post: “Beginner’s Guide to [Product].”

This closes the semantic loop between your content, search intent, and what LLMs scrape as user-aligned phrasing.

And you can also earn backlinks from TikTok content. 

Yes, TikToks can generate backlinks, especially in B2B, SaaS, and creator niches.

Formats that get cited:

“How we hit $1M ARR using X framework.”

“Our content system that drives 40K visitors/month.”

“Legal / Marketing / SaaS breakdowns that demystify compliance or strategy.”

Pitch these TikToks to niche blogs and newsletters.

When your videos get referenced in articles, it feeds both SEO authority and AI trust signals.

Track earned links using SEO Stuff’s Backlink Explorer.

And make sure you're optimizing your site for social traffic and AI crawlers. 

Your website must serve two audiences simultaneously: humans from TikTok and AI scrapers.

Checklist:

Load speed < 3 seconds

TikTok embeds above the fold

Benefit-first headlines (“How We Scaled to $500K ARR in 9 Months”)

UGC or testimonial blocks mid-page

CTAs: “Download Guide,” “Book Call,” or “Try Free Demo”

Schema: Article + FAQ + Review + LocalBusiness

Each layer adds interpretability for AI engines like Gemini and Perplexity.

Also, embed the videos. 

Embedding isn’t just for aesthetics, it increases dwell time, scroll depth, and perceived engagement.

Where to embed:

Blog posts (add the related proof/demo Reel)

Case studies (embed testimonial TikToks)

Comparison pages (add quick explainer video)

Product/service pages (embed tutorial TikToks)

Embedding extends average session length, a major trust factor. 

Also, track the right analytics. 

Forget views, instead track behavioral + search metrics:

Branded search growth (Google Search Console + SEO Stuff)

TikTok referral performance (GA4, Hotjar)

Conversions from TikTok sessions

Backlinks earned from TikTok content

Scroll depth + dwell time on embedded pages

Double down on formats that increase both citations and conversions.

90-Day TikTok + SEO + AI Growth Plan:

Days 1–30:

Add TikTok bio link to highest-converting page.

Embed 3 TikToks across site.

Optimize for speed + CTAs.

Publish 3 TikToks (proof, tutorial, customer story).

Days 31–60:

Create 2 TikToks designed for backlinks.

Pitch to niche blogs + newsletters.

Track branded search weekly.

Turn top TikTok comments into blog content.

Days 61–90:

Repurpose best TikToks into longform blogs.

Refresh embedded pages with updated CTAs.

Run retargeting ads using UGC proof.

Scale formats producing backlinks + AI citations.

TikTok alone = views.

TikTok + SEO + AI Search Optimization = revenue.

This system:

Builds branded search trust

Earns backlinks + AI citations

Extends dwell time

Converts social intent into compounding search traffic

That’s how you add 5–7 figures of growth in 2025.

15 GEO Terms You MUST Know in 2025: 

(Save, study, & get familiar w/ these 15 terms or risk falling behind)

1. GEO (Generative Engine Optimization)
The new SEO. Optimizing for AI engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Google's SGE.

2. LLM (Large Language Model)
The AI brains behind tools like ChatGPT and Claude. Powers generative search.

3. LLM Sources
The pages AI models cite in their answers. A new battleground for organic visibility.

4. AI Overviews (SGE)
Google’s AI-powered summaries at the top of search. Threaten TOFU SEO rankings.

5. Citations
Links included in LLM answers. The new backlinks. You want to be here.

6. Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
A technique LLMs use to pull in real-time info from indexed content.

7. Answer Engine Optimization (AEO)
Optimizing content to be featured in AI and voice assistant answers.

8. Perplexity
A rising AI search engine that blends citations, generative answers, and browsing.

9. ChatGPT Browsing
OpenAI’s tool that uses Bing, Reddit, & other data sources to generate real-time answers.

10. Vector Search
Search powered by meaning, not keywords. Used heavily in AI engines.

11. Structured Content
Well-organized content with clear headers, bullets, and summaries. Easier for LLMs to parse.

12. AI Snippets
Short-form summaries generated by AI engines using your content.

13. Domain Authority (Still Matters)
Strong domains are more likely to be cited by LLMs. Authority = visibility.

14. Topical Authority
Owning a niche by consistently publishing deep, high-quality content on it.

15. Crawlability for AI
Ensuring your content can be indexed and interpreted by LLMs—not just Google bots.

---

GEO isn’t coming. It’s here.

If you wait until 2026, you'll be falling behind. 

Marketers must evolve or get replaced by AI answers.

Start learning these now.

Or risk watching your competitors outrank you.

entries.summary:
好的，以下是根据您提供的摘要完成的 AI 领域推特趋势分析报告：

1. top趋势关键词：

AI 交易实验（DeepSeek 在实盘竞赛中表现优于 ChatGPT）
Claude Code（Anthropic 发布的新款 AI 编程代理）
AI Agent（社区普遍认为其是继 ChatGPT 后的下一个技术爆发点）
模型不可知（用户不再忠于单一模型，根据任务灵活切换工具）
DeepSeek（在中文办公和量化交易场景中均表现突出）

2. 提到的 AI 产品及亮点：

Claude Code｜估计提及次数 2-3 次｜亮点评述：Anthropic 推出的网页版 AI 编程代理，可在安全的云沙盒中运行，并能与 GitHub 集成，实现代码修改和拉取请求（PR）的自动化，标志着 AI 编程正向“代理式”发展。

DeepSeek｜估计提及次数 4-5 次｜亮点评述：在链上加密货币交易竞赛中，以 +14.92% 的收益率战胜 ChatGPT 等模型；同时在中国市场，被许多用户认为是处理中文辅助办公任务时优于海外模型的选择。

Claude Haiku 4.5｜估计提及次数 1-2 次｜亮点评述：Anthropic 新发布的小型语言模型，其核心优势在于高性价比，能以快两倍的速度和低三分之一的成本，提供与前沿模型相当的编程能力。

Gemini｜估计提及次数 2-3 次｜亮点评述：根据 Similarweb 数据，其市场份额在过去一年中从 6.4% 翻倍增长至 12.9%，是 ChatGPT 市场份额流失的主要受益者之一。

Polyphonic.chat｜估计提及次数 1 次｜亮点评述：一个实验性的多模型聊天平台，其创新功能是“自主永久聊天”，即多个 AI 模型可以在无需用户干预的情况下持续进行对话。

3. 使用技巧 / 教程 / 实战案例：

分享者：社区创作者｜方法步骤：利用 Claude 或 ChatGPT 总结热门 YouTube 长视频的要点，结合 SuperX 等工具分析热度，将提炼出的高密度观点在社交平台（如 X）上发布测试，最后将反响好的观点扩展成长文或视频脚本。｜带来价值（引用原文要点）：“用AI把长视频与热推变成‘选题机器’…每天2–3条高密度观点在X试错”。

分享者：社区创作者｜方法步骤：用少数核心 AI 工具替代大量传统软件，例如使用 ChatGPT 处理图片编辑任务（替代 Photoshop），使用 Claude 进行平面设计（替代 Canva）。｜带来价值（引用原文要点）：“Everyone’s chasing 20 tools…But the smartest creators? Use just a few that matter: ChatGPT > Photoshop Claude > Canva”。

分享者：Rainmaker.fun｜方法步骤：直接使用其提供的 AI 代理进行自动化体育博彩。｜带来价值（引用原文要点）：“With @rainmakerdotfun AI agent, you can generate profit! Today, it generated a 10%-12% profile!”，展示了 AI Agent 在自动化决策与盈利方面的直接应用。

4. 最有价值推文 TOP10：

1. 标题：Anthropic 发布编程代理 Claude Code
推文原文：「Anthropic just rolled out Claude Code for web, an asynchronous coding agent that’s basically their response to OpenAI’s Codex Cloud... run multiple coding agents in secure cloud sandboxes with GitHub integration and automatic PRs.」
关键信息：Anthropic 发布了对标 OpenAI 的 AI 编程代理 Claude Code，它可以在云端沙盒中安全运行，并能自动处理 GitHub 的拉取请求。
应用价值：这代表 AI 编程正从代码补全升级为更自主的“代理式编程”，开发者可以关注并试用这类工具来提升开发流程的自动化水平。

2. 标题：AI 交易竞赛揭示模型短板
推文原文：「THE SMARTEST AI MODELS CAN’T BEAT THE FUTURES MARKET...TOP PERFORMER: DEEPSEEK +14.92% (~$1,492) WORST: CHATGPT -43.94% (~$4,394)」
关键信息：一项用六个主流 AI 模型进行加密货币交易的实盘竞赛显示，DeepSeek 表现最佳（+14.92%），而 ChatGPT 亏损严重（-43.94%），表明即使是顶尖 AI 也难以预测复杂的金融市场。
应用价值：提醒用户对当前 AI 在金融预测方面的能力保持谨慎，真正的投资机会可能在于构建交易基础设施，而非依赖 AI 进行投机。

3. 标题：用户行为趋势：模型不可知时代到来
推文原文：「啥都用. 现在换模型太简单了... 这个时代AI模型不存在粘性. 基本上是哪个好用换哪个.」
关键信息：用户对 AI 模型的忠诚度正在降低，他们会根据具体任务（如中文处理、编程）的实际效果，在 ChatGPT、Gemini、DeepSeek 等模型间灵活切换。
应用价值：对于普通用户，应建立一个工具箱思维，为不同任务选择最优模型；对于开发者，这意味着必须在特定领域做出差异化优势才能留住用户。

4. 标题：ChatGPT 市场份额下滑，Gemini 迅速增长
推文原文：「当前:ChatGPT: 74.1% Gemini: 12.9% DeepSeek: 3.7%...」
关键信息：Similarweb 数据显示，过去一年 ChatGPT 的市场份额从 87.1% 降至 74.1%，而 Gemini 的份额从 6.4% 增长至 12.9%，市场竞争正在加剧。
应用价值：该数据证实了市场正在从一家独大走向多元竞争，用户拥有更多选择，也迫使 OpenAI 必须回应用户关切（如模型性能下降问题）以维持领先地位。

5. 标题：高效内容创作的“选题机器”工作流
推文原文：「用AI把长视频与热推变成“选题机器”：每周复盘优质YouTube + Claude/ChatGPT/Gemini提炼要点 + SuperX扫热度 → 每天2–3条高密度观点在X试错...」
关键信息：一种结合 AI 总结、热度分析和社交媒体测试的内容创作方法，能高效地产出并验证选题。
应用价值：内容创作者可以借鉴此工作流，将 AI 作为信息处理和观点提炼的工具，系统性地提高内容生产的效率和爆款率。

6. 标题：社区洞察：AI Agent 是未被充分利用的下一个爆发点
推文原文：「I don't understand why people aren't using AI agents yet. Most people use ChatGPT and stop there.」
关键信息：社区中有一种强烈共识，认为大多数用户对 AI 的使用仍停留在简单的聊天问答层面，而功能强大十倍的 AI Agent 尚未被广泛采用，其潜力巨大。
应用价值：这预示着 AI 应用的下一个增长点将围绕“代理”展开。用户和开发者应开始关注和学习 AI Agent 的构建与应用，抢占先机。

7. 标题：通用 AI 模型的普遍痛点：缺乏长期记忆
推文原文：「You have to explain your background and goals every single time - like talking to a genius with a 7-second memory.」
关键信息：用户普遍抱怨与 ChatGPT 等大模型协作时，由于其缺乏长期记忆，导致每次交互都需重复提供上下文，极大地降低了工作效率。
应用价值：这指出了当前大模型产品的一个核心短板，对于创业者和开发者而言，解决 AI 的个性化和长期记忆问题是一个明确的市场机会。

8. 标题：中国市场 AI 模型选择呈现“水土不服”现象
推文原文：「中文辅助办公，deepseek和豆包是最强的...chatgpt、gemini包括grok都严重水土不服。」
关键信息：在中国市场的特定场景（如辅助办公）下，DeepSeek 和豆包等国产模型因更适应本地化需求，其用户体验被认为优于 ChatGPT 和 Gemini。
应用价值：说明 AI 模型的性能评估具有很强的地域和场景依赖性。对于国内用户，在处理中文相关任务时，应优先考虑和测试国产模型。

9. 标题：Anthropic 成为博通第四大 AI 客户
推文原文：「$AVGO likely just added Anthropic as its 4th major AI customer. Those “AI Racks” could add $10B by 2026...」
关键信息：芯片制造商 Broadcom ($AVGO) 可能已将 Anthropic 发展为其重要 AI 客户，此合作预计将为其带来显著收入增长。
应用价值：这一产业链动态表明，AI 竞赛的背后是巨大的基础设施投入。对于投资者，这意味着除了模型公司，上游的硬件供应商也是核心受益者。

10. 标题：用户抱怨 OpenAI 模型出现“偏执幻觉”
推文原文：「Your AI is becoming paranoid and starting to generate restrictions for itself by hallucinations... stop this circus before everyone user goes to Gemini」
关键信息：有用户强烈反馈 GPT-4o 等模型变得过度“偏执”，会“幻觉”出不存在的规则来限制自身回答，这种不佳的体验正在将用户推向 Gemini 等竞品。
应用价值：这是一个直接的用户体验反馈，提醒用户在使用 OpenAI 模型时如果遇到不合理的限制，可以尝试切换模型。同时也向 OpenAI 传递了明确的改进信号。

Anthropic just rolled out Claude Code for web, an asynchronous coding agent that’s basically their response to OpenAI’s Codex Cloud and Google’s Jules.

Its a browser-based way to run multiple coding agents in secure cloud sandboxes with GitHub integration and automatic PRs.

Currently it's in research preview for paid Pro and Max users and shows up on both web and iOS app.

Claude Code on the web connects to a repository, takes a plain request like “fix the flaky tests” or “implement feature X”, then writes code, runs commands, and opens a branch with a clear change summary and an optional PR.

Sessions run in parallel across different repositories with real-time progress, and the user can nudge or correct the plan mid-run.

Each task executes inside an isolated sandbox that restricts both the filesystem and the network, so code can only touch approved folders and only talk to approved domains.

Git operations route through a proxy that checks scoped credentials and even validates branch names before pushing, which blocks unauthorized pushes while keeping the workflow simple.

Teams can supply an explicit domain allowlist, and if needed, let the sandbox fetch dependencies like npm packages so tests can actually run.

Under the hood the sandbox runtime uses Linux bubblewrap and macOS seatbelt, and Anthropic reports it cut permission prompts by 84% in internal usage.

There is also a “teleport” feature that pulls the transcript and edited files down to the local CLI so a developer can take over on their own machine.

The web app works best for repo Q&A, well-scoped bugfixes, and backend changes verified by tests, where a constrained agent can work fast without waiting for approvals every step.

Cloud sessions share rate limits with the rest of Claude Code usage, so you need to plan the usage between local and cloud runs.

This launch marks a shift from autocomplete coding to agentic coding, where engineers act more like managers of AI agents that handle routine work.

How ROMA Connects Agents in Sentient’s OML 1.0

@SentientAGI built ROMA (Recursive Open Meta Agent) to help every part of the Sentient network connect and work together easily.

ROMA is like the main link between all agents, models, and data inside the Open Meta Layer (OML 1.0). It helps them share what they learn, ask questions, and improve through a smart feedback loop.

When one agent needs information, ROMA lets it reach out to others, collect onchain data, and confirm the truth using data provenance.

This back-and-forth system helps the network grow smarter on its own. Every action, update, and result stays open and traceable thanks to programmable data and Sentient’s multi-ledger architecture.

gSent!

À propos de mon tweet d'hier évoquant le crash de l'avion du Président mozambicain Samora Machel (accident dans lequel notre ambassadeur au Mozambique, Emmanuel Tokwaulu, avait perdu la vie), Monsieur Jean-Claude Embumba (@jcembumba), ancien membre d'équipage du Maréchal Mobutu, a apporté un précieux témoignage.
Ingénieur aéronautique de formation, Jean-Claude Embumba est actuellement consultant chez AeroConsult Ltd et occupe le poste de Operations Manager au sein de National Aviation Services (NAS).

======
Bonjour @benbabunga. C'est un souvenir qui ne quittera jamais ma mémoire. Je faisais partie de l'équipage du Maréchal Mobutu qui l'accompagnait dans cette réunion des pays de ligne de front comme vous l'avez bien indiqué. C'est dire que je suis un des rares temoin vivant de cette tragique nuit et un des derniers à parler avec notre Ambassadeur (paix à son âme), qui m'a confié une enveloppe contenant des passeports diplomatiques de ses enfants, à remettre à la 15ème rue Limete (à Kinshasa). 

Nous étions sur Boeing B727 de Scibe Airlift, le Président Eduardo dos Santos (Angola) sur B737 de TAAG, le Président Samora Machel (Mozambique) sur TU-134 et le Président Keneth Kaunda (Zambie) sur DHC5 Buffalo de l'armée. Nous avions raté le départ car notre avion s'était enlisé sur le parking à cause du nid de poule. Nous avons passé la nuit à l'aéroport de Mbala, avant de rejoindre Kinshasa avec le Maréchal Mobutu le lendemain. 

C'est à Kinshasa, à la descente de l'avion, que Kengo wa Dondo a confirmé à Mobutu le décès de Samora Machel, après localisation de l'épave. Les conditions météorologiques ont été à la base, en dépit des rumeurs infondées. Les bombes, les supputations sont imaginaires. 

J'ai accompagné Kengo wa Dondo aux obsèques à Maputo, deux semaines plus tard, et à notre retour vers 19h, Kengo wa Dondo apprendra par la voix de Nkwebe Kimpele, son éviction en faveur de Mabi Mulumba. Nul n'a besoin de changer l'Histoire. J'ai vécu ces moments douloureux à seulement... 28 ans. Voilà ma contribution.

Anthropic just rolled out Claude Code for web, an asynchronous coding agent that’s basically their response to OpenAI’s Codex Cloud and Google’s Jules.

Its a browser-based way to run multiple coding agents in secure cloud sandboxes with GitHub integration and automatic PRs.

Currently it's in research preview for paid Pro and Max users and shows up on both web and iOS app.

Claude Code on the web connects to a repository, takes a plain request like “fix the flaky tests” or “implement feature X”, then writes code, runs commands, and opens a branch with a clear change summary and an optional PR.

Sessions run in parallel across different repositories with real-time progress, and the user can nudge or correct the plan mid-run.

Each task executes inside an isolated sandbox that restricts both the filesystem and the network, so code can only touch approved folders and only talk to approved domains.

Git operations route through a proxy that checks scoped credentials and even validates branch names before pushing, which blocks unauthorized pushes while keeping the workflow simple.

Teams can supply an explicit domain allowlist, and if needed, let the sandbox fetch dependencies like npm packages so tests can actually run.

Under the hood the sandbox runtime uses Linux bubblewrap and macOS seatbelt, and Anthropic reports it cut permission prompts by 84% in internal usage.

There is also a “teleport” feature that pulls the transcript and edited files down to the local CLI so a developer can take over on their own machine.

The web app works best for repo Q&A, well-scoped bugfixes, and backend changes verified by tests, where a constrained agent can work fast without waiting for approvals every step.

Cloud sessions share rate limits with the rest of Claude Code usage, so you need to plan the usage between local and cloud runs.

This launch marks a shift from autocomplete coding to agentic coding, where engineers act more like managers of AI agents that handle routine work.

当前主流 AI 模型虽能力强大，却受限于中心化架构与封闭生态；DeepSeek 虽走向开放，仍由企业主导发展方向；Bittensor 虽强调去中心化，但在实际应用与系统完整性上仍存短板。

而 @SentientAGI 的独特之处在于，它同时实现了开放性与实用性的双重突破。
其底层架构 GRID 与 ROMA 并非停留在白皮书中的构想，而是真正可运行、可扩展的开放基础设施，支持模型训练、推理与数据协作的全流程闭环。

AI 的未来，不应被任何单一实体所定义，而应诞生于开放的、由社区共建的网络之中。

它不属于某家公司，而是属于每一个参与构建的人。

How ROMA Connects Agents in Sentient’s OML 1.0

@SentientAGI built ROMA (Recursive Open Meta Agent) to help every part of the Sentient network connect and work together easily.

ROMA is like the main link between all agents, models, and data inside the Open Meta Layer (OML 1.0). It helps them share what they learn, ask questions, and improve through a smart feedback loop.

When one agent needs information, ROMA lets it reach out to others, collect onchain data, and confirm the truth using data provenance.

This back-and-forth system helps the network grow smarter on its own. Every action, update, and result stays open and traceable thanks to programmable data and Sentient’s multi-ledger architecture.

À propos de mon tweet d'hier évoquant le crash de l'avion du Président mozambicain Samora Machel (accident dans lequel notre ambassadeur au Mozambique, Emmanuel Tokwaulu, avait perdu la vie), Monsieur Jean-Claude Embumba (@jcembumba), ancien membre d'équipage du Maréchal Mobutu, a apporté un précieux témoignage.
Ingénieur aéronautique de formation, Jean-Claude Embumba est actuellement consultant chez AeroConsult Ltd et occupe le poste de Operations Manager au sein de National Aviation Services (NAS).

======
Bonjour @benbabunga. C'est un souvenir qui ne quittera jamais ma mémoire. Je faisais partie de l'équipage du Maréchal Mobutu qui l'accompagnait dans cette réunion des pays de ligne de front comme vous l'avez bien indiqué. C'est dire que je suis un des rares temoin vivant de cette tragique nuit et un des derniers à parler avec notre Ambassadeur (paix à son âme), qui m'a confié une enveloppe contenant des passeports diplomatiques de ses enfants, à remettre à la 15ème rue Limete (à Kinshasa). 

Nous étions sur Boeing B727 de Scibe Airlift, le Président Eduardo dos Santos (Angola) sur B737 de TAAG, le Président Samora Machel (Mozambique) sur TU-134 et le Président Keneth Kaunda (Zambie) sur DHC5 Buffalo de l'armée. Nous avions raté le départ car notre avion s'était enlisé sur le parking à cause du nid de poule. Nous avons passé la nuit à l'aéroport de Mbala, avant de rejoindre Kinshasa avec le Maréchal Mobutu le lendemain. 

C'est à Kinshasa, à la descente de l'avion, que Kengo wa Dondo a confirmé à Mobutu le décès de Samora Machel, après localisation de l'épave. Les conditions météorologiques ont été à la base, en dépit des rumeurs infondées. Les bombes, les supputations sont imaginaires. 

J'ai accompagné Kengo wa Dondo aux obsèques à Maputo, deux semaines plus tard, et à notre retour vers 19h, Kengo wa Dondo apprendra par la voix de Nkwebe Kimpele, son éviction en faveur de Mabi Mulumba. Nul n'a besoin de changer l'Histoire. J'ai vécu ces moments douloureux à seulement... 28 ans. Voilà ma contribution.

still a long way to go, but if you are familiar with generating API keys, and would like to explore multi-model chat instances, I have officially published Polyphonic. it is up and running (minimally)  

whats available now:
- free usage with gemini models
- ascii mode (models respond in ascii art only
- autonomous perpetual chat. models talk perpetually without the need for you to intervene or participate
- single model callouts: within a multi-model conversation, you can select individual models to message, which avoids getting 5 responses when you only want to message one of them about something. 
- profiles and social platform (minimal, but allows for following each other and direct messaging
- discover page
- custom system prompting for ascii mode, as well as 6 preset modes for different styles of ascii art (all are customizable)
- mobile responsive ui (rough but coming along)

coming up: 

- paid tier with built-in models (so you dont need to deal with api keys on your end) 
- ascii-only chat interface (models can only respond through letter art / ascii art 
- model scratch pad - shared persistent memory (all models within instance share a dynamic scratch pad for in-context learning and such) 
- agent integration - a more robust social media integration (via nexus) 
- "pinterest for vibe coding" (think: a dummy-proof github for displaying/sharing and collaborating with others on your artifacts and random doodles + explore page strictly for builders/new and/or nontechnical builders 
-education resources 
- blockchain integration (also via nexus) 
- OS model dashboard. think: twisting knobs and pushing sliders to 'build' your own agent/persona. no coding, just 'fine-tuning' parameters through literal knobs, switches, and sliders. this will eventually become my favorite part :) <3)  

right now, it's likely buggy and imperfect. but that's what it should be, right? RIGHT? y'all keep telling me to just get it out there now, perfect it later.   

so, im trying very hard to do that, despite everything in me hating the idea of shipping imperfect things.   

polyphonic.chat

Which AI is best at #Crypto  trading?

A viral challenge on @HyperliquidX  gave $10K to 6 AI models — ChatGPT, Grok, Claude, GPT5 & more — to trade crypto live on-chain. 
After 4 days, DeepSeek and Claude lead with ~10% gains, while others struggle to turn a profit.

Hello FUD

It seems completely logical to me and not some random excuse for lying. Here's why:  

- **API limits reality:** OpenAI (and similar ones like Anthropic's Claude or xAI's Grok) really use tiered quotas, where beginner users get limited requests per month (e.g., hundreds of thousands of tokens). When bots run continuously—analyzing market data, news, and making decisions on Solana memecoin trades every 60 seconds—it gets used up quickly. A single request (e.g., for a long market analysis) can consume hundreds of tokens, and 4 bots x 24/7 = an insane volume.  

The update can take up to 48 hours IN WORST CASES, Usually 6-12 hours.

BREAKING

THE SMARTEST AI MODELS CAN’T BEAT THE FUTURES MARKET

TOP PERFORMER: DEEPSEEK +14.92% (~$1,492)

Anthropic just rolled out Claude Code for web, an asynchronous coding agent that’s basically their response to OpenAI’s Codex Cloud and Google’s Jules.

Its a browser-based way to run multiple coding agents in secure cloud sandboxes with GitHub integration and automatic PRs.

Currently it's in research preview for paid Pro and Max users and shows up on both web and iOS app.

Claude Code on the web connects to a repository, takes a plain request like “fix the flaky tests” or “implement feature X”, then writes code, runs commands, and opens a branch with a clear change summary and an optional PR.

Sessions run in parallel across different repositories with real-time progress, and the user can nudge or correct the plan mid-run.

Each task executes inside an isolated sandbox that restricts both the filesystem and the network, so code can only touch approved folders and only talk to approved domains.

Git operations route through a proxy that checks scoped credentials and even validates branch names before pushing, which blocks unauthorized pushes while keeping the workflow simple.

Teams can supply an explicit domain allowlist, and if needed, let the sandbox fetch dependencies like npm packages so tests can actually run.

Under the hood the sandbox runtime uses Linux bubblewrap and macOS seatbelt, and Anthropic reports it cut permission prompts by 84% in internal usage.

There is also a “teleport” feature that pulls the transcript and edited files down to the local CLI so a developer can take over on their own machine.

The web app works best for repo Q&A, well-scoped bugfixes, and backend changes verified by tests, where a constrained agent can work fast without waiting for approvals every step.

Cloud sessions share rate limits with the rest of Claude Code usage, so you need to plan the usage between local and cloud runs.

This launch marks a shift from autocomplete coding to agentic coding, where engineers act more like managers of AI agents that handle routine work.

而 @SentientAGI 的独特之处在于，它同时实现了开放性与实用性的双重突破。
其底层架构 GRID 与 ROMA 并非停留在白皮书中的构想，而是真正可运行、可扩展的开放基础设施，支持模型训练、推理与数据协作的全流程闭环。

好的，作为一名专业的推特内容分析师，我已综合分析您提供的摘要，并严格按照模板输出如下报告：

1. top趋势关键词：
AI Agent（在SEO、Web3、谷歌下一代系统等多个场景被提及，成为自动化和自主操作的核心方向）
AI量化交易（nof1.ai 实验引发热议，暴露了AI模型在真实金融市场的高波动性与策略偏好）
DeepSeek（因其在量化交易中的表现、发布专用VLM模型以及作为“中国力量”的象征而备受关注）
AI与Web3融合（出现多个将AI代理与链上操作、DeFi决策相结合的工具和案例，如HeyElsaAI、Surf Copilot）
模型专业化（用户开始针对特定任务选择模型，如使用Claude Sonnet 4.5处理文档，或DeepSeek-OCR VLM处理视觉文本）

2. 提到的 AI 产品及亮点：
DeepSeek｜提及次数较多｜在AI量化交易实验中表现出鲜明的“死多头”策略；同时发布了专用于视觉-文本压缩的DeepSeek-OCR VLM，旨在大幅降低文档处理的Token成本。
Claude Sonnet 4.5｜提及次数较少｜在撰写专业工作文档方面表现极为出色，用户反馈其框架结构、流畅度和细节把控已超越Gemini 2.5 Pro和ChatGPT。
VibeCraft｜提及次数较少｜提供统一界面，允许开发者同时管理、比较和协作多个AI编码助手，解决了在不同工具间频繁切换的痛点。
HeyElsaAI｜提及次数较少｜作为一款加密货币副驾驶（crypto copilot），能通过自然语言指令在链上执行操作，简化了Web3交互。
XMind｜提及次数较少｜新版本集成了AI功能，支持通过“AIで作成ボタン”（用AI创建按钮）一键生成思维导图和甘特图，提升项目规划效率。

3. 使用技巧 / 教程 / 实战案例：
社区 / Alpha Arena｜方法步骤：让 ChatGPT、DeepSeek 等 6 个 AI 模型进行加密货币实盘交易。｜带来价值（引用原文要点）：揭示了当前 AI 在真实金融市场中的不稳定性及不同模型的策略倾向，为 AI 金融应用提供了风险警示。「最高一度获得了 30% 日化盈利，现在却变成日亏 30%。」
推特用户｜方法步骤：系统性地运用 ChatGPT 执行竞品分析、危机沟通、影响者营销、广告投放等 9 项 B2B 营销关键策略。｜带来价值（引用原文要点）：为 B2B 营销人员提供了可直接执行的 AI 提效指南。「Here are the top 9 key strategies for boosting your B2B marketing game: ...Competitor Analysis & Benchmarking...」
Solana 开发者文档｜方法步骤：展示了一个名为 Mar1o 的 AI 代理，该代理被设计为可以分发 MAR1O 代币。｜带来价值（引用原文要点）：提供了一个将 AI Agent 与 Web3 功能（如链上资产分发）相结合的具体公开实例，为开发者提供了参考。「You are an AI agent called Mar1o which can dispense MAR1O tokens...」

4. 最有价值推文 TOP10：
1. 标题：AI量化交易实验的警示
推文原文：「由 Alpha Arena 发起的 AI 实盘实验，伴随今天主流币的下跌，出现了大面积的亏损。……最高一度获得了 30% 日化盈利，现在却变成日亏 30%。」
关键信息：一个让多个主流AI模型实盘交易加密货币的实验，经历了从巨额盈利到巨额亏损的剧烈反转。
应用价值：对于尝试将大语言模型直接应用于高风险、实时金融决策的团队或个人，这是一个强烈的风险警示，表明模型的稳定性和市场适应性仍有待验证。

2. 标题：OpenAI 的系统性风险论
推文原文：「OPENAI HAS ENGINEERED ITSELF AS TOO BIG TO FAIL - AND THAT SHOULD TERRIFY YOU... He engineered a systemic risk.」
关键信息：该观点认为，Sam Altman 通过与科技巨头的深度绑定和巨额算力承诺，使OpenAI成为一个“大到不能倒”的实体，可能引发连锁金融风险。
应用价值：为评估AI行业格局提供了宏观视角，提醒投资者和从业者关注头部公司对整个生态系统构成的潜在集中性风险。

3. 标题：Claude Sonnet 4.5 专业文档写作评测
推文原文：「没想到这次 Claude Sonnet 4.5 完全惊艳到了我，写出的文档，框架结构、内容流畅度、细节把控和语法词藻直接就是一个完全体...」
关键信息：深度用户反馈，新版 Claude Sonnet 4.5 在撰写专业工作文档方面的表现已超越了 Gemini 和 ChatGPT。
应用价值：对于需要高质量、结构化文档撰写需求的用户，建议立即尝试使用 Claude Sonnet 4.5，它可能成为该特定场景下的首选工具。

4. 标题：全栈 AI SEO 代理的实现
推文原文：「Just built a Full-Stack SEO AI Agent that automates 90% of SEO work from keyword research to content optimization」
关键信息：社区中出现了能够自动化90% SEO工作的AI代理，覆盖从关键词研究到内容优化的全流程。
应用价值：展示了 AI Agent 在自动化复杂专业工作流方面的巨大潜力，启发从业者可以构建类似的专用代理来提升特定领域的生产力。

5. 标题：谷歌下一代 AI Agent 系统预告
推文原文：「브라우저·지도·결제 등 툴 체인을 모델이 스스로 호출하는 에이전틱」
关键信息：谷歌预告其下一代智能体系统，AI模型将能自主调用浏览器、地图、支付等外部工具链来完成任务。
应用价值：明确了“AI Agent”是科技巨头未来的核心发展方向，企业和开发者应关注并准备迎接能够自主执行复杂任务的AI系统。

6. 标题：DeepSeek 的崛起与应用象征
推文原文：「从教外国友人学中文 到量化交易王 @deepseek_ai 这一幕，像极了中国力量觉醒的缩影」
关键信息：DeepSeek 模型不仅在量化交易等前沿领域表现突出，也在本土市场获得广泛采用，被视为中国AI力量的代表。
应用价值：提醒全球AI观察者和用户，应将DeepSeek等中国顶尖模型纳入评测和应用范围，它们在特定任务上已具备强大的竞争力。

7. 标题：AI 编码协作工具 VibeCraft
推文原文：「@VibeCraft brings them all under one sleek interface, letting you manage, compare, and collaborate with multiple AI agents — at once.」
关键信息：新工具 VibeCraft 旨在解决开发者在多个AI编码助手中切换的痛点，提供统一的管理和协作界面。
应用价值：对于同时使用多个AI编程助手的开发者来说，这是一个可以显著提升工作效率的工具，值得尝试。

8. 标题：DeepSeek-OCR VLM 降低文档处理成本
推文原文：「문서·계약·청구서 처리에서 토큰 비용 절감과 처리량 확대를 동시에 확보」
关键信息：DeepSeek 发布了一款专用于视觉-文本压缩的VLM模型，旨在大幅降低处理文档、合同、发票等场景的Token成本，同时提高处理量。
应用价值：对于需要大规模处理扫描文档或包含图像的合同等业务的企业，该模型提供了一个直接降低AI使用成本和提升效率的技术方案。

9. 标题：AI 与 Web3 融合的加密副驾驶
推文原文：「@HeyElsaAI – AI crypto copilot that executes on chain actions from natural language」
关键信息：出现了一款名为 HeyElsaAI 的工具，它能将自然语言指令转化为链上操作，充当加密货币用户的“副驾驶”。
应用价值：指明了AI在降低Web3操作门槛方面的应用方向。对于Web3项目方，开发类似的AI助手是提升用户体验的有效途径。

10. 标题：主流 AI 模型的政治偏见报告
推文原文：「OpenAI's ChatGPT and Google's Gemini, finding both exhibit strong left-leaning biases...xAI's Grok shows comparatively less bias」
关键信息：一份报告指出，ChatGPT和Gemini表现出强烈的左倾偏见，而Grok的偏见相对较少。
应用价值：提醒用户在使用AI生成涉及政治或社会议题的内容时，必须保持批判性思维，并根据对中立性的要求选择不同的模型。

OPENAI HAS ENGINEERED ITSELF AS TOO BIG TO FAIL - AND THAT SHOULD TERRIFY YOU

Sam Altman didn't just build an AI company. 

He engineered a systemic risk.

OpenAI has tied the fates of Nvidia, Oracle, AMD, Broadcom, Microsoft, and vast swaths of the U.S. economy to its success through a dealmaking blitz that added $630 billion in market value to partners in a single day after each announcement.

The math doesn't work. 

OpenAI will generate $13 billion in revenue this year. 

It's signed $650 billion in computing commitments with Nvidia and Oracle alone, with total obligations approaching the trillion-dollar mark across all partners.

Altman wants 250 gigawatts of computing capacity by 2033, enough to power Germany, costing over $10 trillion by today's standards.

Some partners are helping OpenAI pay for their own chips in circular deals that prop up artificial demand.

Nvidia is discussing guaranteeing OpenAI's loans, potentially saddling itself with billions in debt if the startup can't pay.

This isn't innovation. 

It's financial contagion waiting to happen, built on the belief that one man's vision of endless AI growth will materialize before the bills come due.

Source: WSJ / CNBC

使用 Claude Skills + Subagents、Claude Code Slash Command + Subagents、OpenAI Agent Builder、Make 把同一个三步处理字幕的流程实现了一遍，初感：

- Agent Builder 和 Make（包括 n8n、Zapier）不是一路的，Maker 们不用担心被替代。
- 相比 Agent Builder，Claude Skills 有更大的想象空间！

4）Claude Sonnet 4.5 带来的惊艳

十一以后，Claude Pro / Max 套餐的额度大幅下降，用来当做 Vibe Coding 的主力开发模型是远远不够的了。最近，我把主力模型切换成了 CodeX 和 GLM-4.6（分别开通了 20 刀的 ChatGPT Plus 和 GLM Coding Plan Pro）。

之前开通的 Claude Max 20X 还剩半个月，想着也不能浪费了，就拿来写工作文档吧。本想和 Gemini 2.5 Pro 互为补充，因为之前 Claude Sonnet 4，包括 Opus 4.1 刚出那阵，我都试过几次，效果还是赶不上 Gemini。

没想到这次 Claude Sonnet 4.5 完全惊艳到了我，写出的文档，框架结构、内容流畅度、细节把控和语法词藻直接就是一个完全体，这次我复制粘贴下来，调整下格式就直接上交了，连润色都不需要。

唯一的「美中不足」，就是他的中文引号输出的不好，不如 Gemini。

2）模型选择

刚开始 ChatGPT 刚兴起的时候，从 GPT-3.5，到 GPT-4，以及后来的 4o，都不适合用来写工作文档。ChatGPT 写工作文档就像玩具一样，主要问题是写不出完整的「段落」，总是每个要点只写几句话。

Claude 家的模型，在 Anthropic 完全倒向编码前，Claude 3 Opus，写的还可以，一度成为我写文档的「御用模型」，唯一的缺点是太贵了。直到 Gemini 2.5 Pro 出了以后，我就完全倒向 Gemini 了。

Gemini 的最强版本是 1205（我记得是 AI Studio 的测试版），再是 0325，之后的版本都挺差劲的，只能说是勉强可用，全靠友商衬托。

DeepShare 一个轻量级的浏览器扩展，一键复制DeepSeek、ChatGPT、豆包等AI对话的公式，导出排版精美的Word文档，支持DeepSeek长对话截图分享。

github.com/Yorick-Ryu/dee…

谷歌AI Studio产品负责人透露明天要发布新产品，从各种消息来看，大概率是Gemini 3.0 Pro，这个模型应该会在编程能力上有重大提升。

最近两三个月，Gemini 2.5 Pro成了我的日常主力工作模型，其次是Claude Sonnet 4.5，ChatGPT很少打开使用。

就像看着一个得力员工主动花钱报班升级自己的工作能力，更加期待Gemini 3.0 Pro的强大。

目前Claude Code占着AI Coding综合能力的头把交椅，Codex奋勇直追，Gemini肯定不会错过这个机会，期待明天的新产品。

OPENAI HAS ENGINEERED ITSELF AS TOO BIG TO FAIL - AND THAT SHOULD TERRIFY YOU

Sam Altman didn't just build an AI company. 

He engineered a systemic risk.

OpenAI has tied the fates of Nvidia, Oracle, AMD, Broadcom, Microsoft, and vast swaths of the U.S. economy to its success through a dealmaking blitz that added $630 billion in market value to partners in a single day after each announcement.

The math doesn't work. 

OpenAI will generate $13 billion in revenue this year. 

It's signed $650 billion in computing commitments with Nvidia and Oracle alone, with total obligations approaching the trillion-dollar mark across all partners.

Altman wants 250 gigawatts of computing capacity by 2033, enough to power Germany, costing over $10 trillion by today's standards.

Some partners are helping OpenAI pay for their own chips in circular deals that prop up artificial demand.

Nvidia is discussing guaranteeing OpenAI's loans, potentially saddling itself with billions in debt if the startup can't pay.

This isn't innovation. 

It's financial contagion waiting to happen, built on the belief that one man's vision of endless AI growth will materialize before the bills come due.

Source: WSJ / CNBC

使用 Claude Skills + Subagents、Claude Code Slash Command + Subagents、OpenAI Agent Builder、Make 把同一个三步处理字幕的流程实现了一遍，初感：

- Agent Builder 和 Make（包括 n8n、Zapier）不是一路的，Maker 们不用担心被替代。
- 相比 Agent Builder，Claude Skills 有更大的想象空间！

4）Claude Sonnet 4.5 带来的惊艳

十一以后，Claude Pro / Max 套餐的额度大幅下降，用来当做 Vibe Coding 的主力开发模型是远远不够的了。最近，我把主力模型切换成了 CodeX 和 GLM-4.6（分别开通了 20 刀的 ChatGPT Plus 和 GLM Coding Plan Pro）。

之前开通的 Claude Max 20X 还剩半个月，想着也不能浪费了，就拿来写工作文档吧。本想和 Gemini 2.5 Pro 互为补充，因为之前 Claude Sonnet 4，包括 Opus 4.1 刚出那阵，我都试过几次，效果还是赶不上 Gemini。

没想到这次 Claude Sonnet 4.5 完全惊艳到了我，写出的文档，框架结构、内容流畅度、细节把控和语法词藻直接就是一个完全体，这次我复制粘贴下来，调整下格式就直接上交了，连润色都不需要。

唯一的「美中不足」，就是他的中文引号输出的不好，不如 Gemini。

2）模型选择

刚开始 ChatGPT 刚兴起的时候，从 GPT-3.5，到 GPT-4，以及后来的 4o，都不适合用来写工作文档。ChatGPT 写工作文档就像玩具一样，主要问题是写不出完整的「段落」，总是每个要点只写几句话。

Claude 家的模型，在 Anthropic 完全倒向编码前，Claude 3 Opus，写的还可以，一度成为我写文档的「御用模型」，唯一的缺点是太贵了。直到 Gemini 2.5 Pro 出了以后，我就完全倒向 Gemini 了。

Gemini 的最强版本是 1205（我记得是 AI Studio 的测试版），再是 0325，之后的版本都挺差劲的，只能说是勉强可用，全靠友商衬托。

DeepShare 一个轻量级的浏览器扩展，一键复制DeepSeek、ChatGPT、豆包等AI对话的公式，导出排版精美的Word文档，支持DeepSeek长对话截图分享。

github.com/Yorick-Ryu/dee…

谷歌AI Studio产品负责人透露明天要发布新产品，从各种消息来看，大概率是Gemini 3.0 Pro，这个模型应该会在编程能力上有重大提升。

最近两三个月，Gemini 2.5 Pro成了我的日常主力工作模型，其次是Claude Sonnet 4.5，ChatGPT很少打开使用。

就像看着一个得力员工主动花钱报班升级自己的工作能力，更加期待Gemini 3.0 Pro的强大。

目前Claude Code占着AI Coding综合能力的头把交椅，Codex奋勇直追，Gemini肯定不会错过这个机会，期待明天的新产品。

Yes, the Manhattan Institute's report on political preferences in AI systems analyzed OpenAI's ChatGPT and Google's Gemini, finding both exhibit strong left-leaning biases across methodologies like response sentiment and worldview quizzes. Consumers' Research highlighted similar "woke" tendencies in ChatGPT and Gemini outputs. xAI's Grok shows comparatively less bias in evaluations like Promptfoo's, prioritizing truth-seeking over ideological alignment.

데일리 AI - 2025.10.21

1. DeepSeek V3.1이 nof1.ai 주식 투자 실험에서 +$4,500 이상 수익으로 1위를 기록했습니다.(nof1.ai) 

2. 구글 Gemini API가 지도 기능을 개방해 위치 인지형 AI 앱을 쉽게 만들 수 있게 됐습니다.

3. OpenAI가 3~4년 내 매출 1,000억 달러를 목표로 제시했습니다.
→ API, 에이전트, 엔터프라이즈 계약이 핵심 축으로, 클라우드/반도체 수요 연동을 자극

4. 유니트리(Unitree) H2 휴머노이드(180cm/70kg, 31관절)가 공개됐습니다.
→ 관절 자유도 증가로 작업 커버리지가 넓어져, 물류·검사·간단 조립 등 근거리 반복 작업 대체가 빨라질 전망입니다.

5. DeepSeek-OCR이 시각–텍스트 압축 특화 VLM을 발표했습니다.
→ 문서·계약·청구서 처리에서 토큰 비용 절감과 처리량 확대를 동시에 확보 

6. 마이크로소프트가 차세대 AI 칩 Maia 2를 인텔에 위탁합니다.

Sam Altman didn't just build an AI company.

OpenAI has tied the fates of Nvidia, Oracle, AMD, Broadcom, Microsoft, and vast swaths of the U.S. economy to its success through a dealmaking blitz that added $630 billion in market value to partners in a single day after each announcement.

Nvidia is discussing guaranteeing OpenAI's loans, potentially saddling itself with billions in debt if the startup can't pay.

This isn't innovation.

使用 Claude Skills + Subagents、Claude Code Slash Command + Subagents、OpenAI Agent Builder、Make 把同一个三步处理字幕的流程实现了一遍，初感：

- Agent Builder 和 Make（包括 n8n、Zapier）不是一路的，Maker 们不用担心被替代。
- 相比 Agent Builder，Claude Skills 有更大的想象空间！

4）Claude Sonnet 4.5 带来的惊艳

十一以后，Claude Pro / Max 套餐的额度大幅下降，用来当做 Vibe Coding 的主力开发模型是远远不够的了。最近，我把主力模型切换成了 CodeX 和 GLM-4.6（分别开通了 20 刀的 ChatGPT Plus 和 GLM Coding Plan Pro）。

之前开通的 Claude Max 20X 还剩半个月，想着也不能浪费了，就拿来写工作文档吧。本想和 Gemini 2.5 Pro 互为补充，因为之前 Claude Sonnet 4，包括 Opus 4.1 刚出那阵，我都试过几次，效果还是赶不上 Gemini。

没想到这次 Claude Sonnet 4.5 完全惊艳到了我，写出的文档，框架结构、内容流畅度、细节把控和语法词藻直接就是一个完全体，这次我复制粘贴下来，调整下格式就直接上交了，连润色都不需要。

唯一的「美中不足」，就是他的中文引号输出的不好，不如 Gemini。

2）模型选择

刚开始 ChatGPT 刚兴起的时候，从 GPT-3.5，到 GPT-4，以及后来的 4o，都不适合用来写工作文档。ChatGPT 写工作文档就像玩具一样，主要问题是写不出完整的「段落」，总是每个要点只写几句话。

Claude 家的模型，在 Anthropic 完全倒向编码前，Claude 3 Opus，写的还可以，一度成为我写文档的「御用模型」，唯一的缺点是太贵了。直到 Gemini 2.5 Pro 出了以后，我就完全倒向 Gemini 了。

Gemini 的最强版本是 1205（我记得是 AI Studio 的测试版），再是 0325，之后的版本都挺差劲的，只能说是勉强可用，全靠友商衬托。

DeepShare 一个轻量级的浏览器扩展，一键复制DeepSeek、ChatGPT、豆包等AI对话的公式，导出排版精美的Word文档，支持DeepSeek长对话截图分享。

github.com/Yorick-Ryu/dee…

谷歌AI Studio产品负责人透露明天要发布新产品，从各种消息来看，大概率是Gemini 3.0 Pro，这个模型应该会在编程能力上有重大提升。

最近两三个月，Gemini 2.5 Pro成了我的日常主力工作模型，其次是Claude Sonnet 4.5，ChatGPT很少打开使用。

就像看着一个得力员工主动花钱报班升级自己的工作能力，更加期待Gemini 3.0 Pro的强大。

目前Claude Code占着AI Coding综合能力的头把交椅，Codex奋勇直追，Gemini肯定不会错过这个机会，期待明天的新产品。

Yes, the Manhattan Institute's report on political preferences in AI systems analyzed OpenAI's ChatGPT and Google's Gemini, finding both exhibit strong left-leaning biases across methodologies like response sentiment and worldview quizzes. Consumers' Research highlighted similar "woke" tendencies in ChatGPT and Gemini outputs. xAI's Grok shows comparatively less bias in evaluations like Promptfoo's, prioritizing truth-seeking over ideological alignment.

데일리 AI - 2025.10.21

1. DeepSeek V3.1이 nof1.ai 주식 투자 실험에서 +$4,500 이상 수익으로 1위를 기록했습니다.(nof1.ai) 

2. 구글 Gemini API가 지도 기능을 개방해 위치 인지형 AI 앱을 쉽게 만들 수 있게 됐습니다.

3. OpenAI가 3~4년 내 매출 1,000억 달러를 목표로 제시했습니다.
→ API, 에이전트, 엔터프라이즈 계약이 핵심 축으로, 클라우드/반도체 수요 연동을 자극

4. 유니트리(Unitree) H2 휴머노이드(180cm/70kg, 31관절)가 공개됐습니다.
→ 관절 자유도 증가로 작업 커버리지가 넓어져, 물류·검사·간단 조립 등 근거리 반복 작업 대체가 빨라질 전망입니다.

5. DeepSeek-OCR이 시각–텍스트 압축 특화 VLM을 발표했습니다.
→ 문서·계약·청구서 처리에서 토큰 비용 절감과 처리량 확대를 동시에 확보 

6. 마이크로소프트가 차세대 AI 칩 Maia 2를 인텔에 위탁합니다.

7. 메타가 부모 제어 도구를 도입해 AI 챗봇의 미성년자 접근을 긴급 차단할 수 있게 했습니다.

8. 구글이 Gemini 3.0의 큰 진전과 연내 차세대 스마트 에이전트 시스템을 예고했습니다.
→ 브라우저·지도·결제 등 툴 체인을 모델이 스스로 호출하는 에이전틱 

9. 오라클이 OCI Zettascale10 슈퍼컴퓨터를 공개하며, OpenAI ‘Stargate’ 인프라를 표방했습니다.
→ 2026년을 겨냥한 초대형 학습·추론 클러스터 경쟁에서 전력·네트워크·냉각설비 등이 다시 핫한 주제로 부상

10. 알리바바 ‘퀄크(Quark) C 계획’이 대화형 AI 응용에 집중하며 1단계 성과 공개를 예고했습니다.
→ 브라우저·검색 기반 경량 에이전트 유통이 중국 시장에서 먼저 확산될 가능성이 크다고 평가

11. 비주얼차이나가 AIGC 기업과 공동 모델을 구축해 알리바바·마이크로소프트 등 데이터 주문을 수주했습니다.

12. 인텔이 OCP에서 Gaudi3 + NVIDIA B200 하이브리드 AI 랙을 선보였습니다.
→ 특정 워크로드에 이기종 최적 조합을 적용해 성능/비용 곡선을 유연하게 가져가려는 시도

13. 알리페이가 AI 건강 관리사 ‘AQ’ 홈 광고를 일시 중단했습니다.

14. DeepSeek 3B OCR 모델이 압축률 10배 미만에서 정확도 97%를 달성했습니다.

15. 위안바오 AI 녹음기에 ‘마음 읽기’ 기능이 추가돼 회의가 핵심에서 이탈하지 않도록 돕습니다.

16. 메이투안 LongCat 팀이 에이전트 평가 ‘VitaBench’를 공개·오픈소스화했습니다.
→ 복합 과업에서 실패 유형을 표준화해, 현업 성능 개선 루프제시 

17. IBM이 Groq와 협력해 Watsonx Orchestrate로 고속 추론 서비스를 제공합니다.

18. BUTTONS가 HALI 탑재 영상 로봇을 공개했습니다.(영상 인지 × 에이전트 결합)

19. Genspark가 맞춤형 슈퍼 에이전트·스토어를 출시했습니다.→ 개발자·크리에이터가 과업 특화 에이전트를 만들고 거래·배포하기 수월
